hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect city hotel.
desc: Great hotel with everything you need. We arrived late in the evening but the staff were extremely helpful, quickly got a cot to the room for our little one. We left late in the evening a few days later and they had excellent facilities such as showers and a large waiting room for people in transit such as ourselves.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful hotel with amazing customer service
desc: Was a great customer experience from the moment of check in to check out. Had a few deliveries during our stay and the staff always brought everything up to the room when they could. Highly recommend The Clan Hotel!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clan Hotel Singapore Staycay
desc: Very nice boutique hotel in the heart of Singapore with great bars and restaurants nearby. Very clean, crisp and perfect for the business trip or short stay. Comfortable bed and Very friendly staff. Ms Joanne Selvaraj was very helpful and accommodating with excellent service.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Design Hotel with rooftop pool
desc: Nice rooms, great breakfast, wonderful rooftop pool and jacuzi with great views, nice gym with view, lovely little touches like tea, chocolate and chips were included. Great breakfast with many choices. Kind staff.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice and charming
desc: This hotel is greatly located between Raffles Place and Chinatown. Very nice design and the overall atmosphere. Efficient and friendly staff, fantastic reception desk. Rooftop pool on 30th floor - not very big but really a nice place to relax. Reasonable pricing and a pretty good value for money. Definitely worth staying at.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay but slightly pricey
desc: Excellent room cleanliness and quality customer service. No shopping malls near the hotel but lots of food options and convenient stores. Check in/out reception was quite congested, can explore having pre-arrival check in to ease the queue.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean, Friendly and Strategic Location
desc: It was my first time staying in The Clan. I couldn't find the entrance at first as the sliding door sensor was off. They switch it off in the night (after a certain time, i think 10pm onwards if I'm not mistaken). You can press the intercom or use your room keycard to access. Lucky someone was coming out so I could go in to check in. Otherwise there should be someone (staff) at the drop off point to assist you. I enjoyed my stay and the place was well maintained and clean sheets. Staff was friendly and helpful. It's also very near to the Telok Ayer MRT station. My office was 3mins walk away (and I usually walk very slow/take much longer than Google's estimated walking time) so that was very convenient location for me.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Location, service and quality
desc: Hidden little gem....get in before the world finds it! Defintely a must if you're looking for accomodation in Singapore. Breakfast a little basic but plenty of Cafe`s with excellent breakfast within 100 metres away fro hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel
desc: Very nice hotel, stayed here during the F1 weekend. Not crowded. Super friendly staff, very nice beds and silent rooms. Good breakfast en excellent pool on 30th floor. Well equiped room and als an gym

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best place to Stay if you like a Boutique experience and a great location
desc: Best place to stay if you like a boutique experience, great attention to detail. Nothing has been left to chance. Checking in and the Tea greeting was a wonderful way to start our stay. And to understand about the area‚Äôs history. We stayed 3 nights at the Clan and then moved to Marina Bay sands for 3 nights as another experience, wish we had stayed 6 nights at The Clan. Will definitely stay here next time we are in Singapore. Thank you To everyone at The Clan.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic new boutique hotel!
desc: Reward yourself with a booking at the Clan Hotel. A stylish hotel with comfy bedding and great shower and bathroom facilities which is conveniently located close to the MRT, Clark and Boat Quay, china town food plus the hip district of Amoy with great bars and cool eating options to boot. We stayed for 5 nights throughout the Singapore f1 and couldn‚Äôt have enjoyed the stay more. The infinity pool, casual breakfast atmosphere and helpful and kind staff really topped the experience. We hope to see you again in 2023. Warm thank you team üôè

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Top notch
desc: I loved this hotel! Rooftop pool was a great place to unwind and cool down. Beds were extremely comfortable, like sleeping on a cloud. The heated toilet was unexpected surprise. Service was top notch. 40 min train ride from Changi. I missed out on the tea ceremony, hopefully next visit.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent, want to come again!
desc: Most pleasant stay. The only negative about it was that it ended eventually. Spent one week in this hotel. Fantastic Sunday special breakfast. Loved the pool area on the 30. floor. Very friendly and attentive staff. Will definitely come again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location and friendly staff, but
desc: The hotel is in a great location in Chinatown with the Heritage Walk ('Eat Street') commencing behind the hotel and continuing for ever :) The room (Grand Premier King) was clean, comfortable and spacious with a good fit-out. Staff at the front desk were very helpful and accommodating. But... the room was double booked and another guest was trying to move in and share the room with us. The Qin restaurant was of the view that breakfast was not included while the booking record in reception showed that it was included. By the time this was sorted out, breakfast was over and an 'all day' (big) breakfast offered on the terrace (no aircon outside of course) The breakfast arrangements were a little odd - no buffet, just 6 set breakfast menus. If you only wanted part of one menu, the

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic accomodation!
desc: Comfortable bed and wonderful shower. The room was also so sound proof and had a beautiful view of Singapore. Awesome pool! The staff was very helpful. We needed to stay another night due to our flight cancellation and The Clan hotel was able to accommodate despite very busy with The Grand Prix season. Thank you!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful Sleek Hotel
desc: Staying with The Clan was the best choice! The location was excellent, right next to the MRT and only a 15 min walk from Mariana by the Bay. Chinatown, right outside their door, was interesting and had great Asian food choices! The view from the pool and hot tub was next level, and we had the space to ourselves at 10 AM. My two favorite things about this hotel were the in-room water filter and cups to cut down on water bottle waste and the shower suite. We had a midnight red-eye flight back to the US, so quite a bit of time to kill after check-out. They had no problem holding our many bags for us, and then after exploring Chinatown all day, we were able to come back to get showered and changed before the long flight home.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful stay
desc: My partner and I enjoyed a great stay at The Clan hotel. The location was convenient so close to Amoy St for restaurants and bars and only a short walk to the riverside and marina. Room was well designed and nicely furnished in muted tones keeping things minimal. The gym and pool have a fantastic view of the city skyline. We enjoyed happy hour drinks on the terrace before heading out for dinner a few nights. Staff were extremely helpful especially when my partner hurt his ankle and needed to attend A&E. Nothing was too much trouble and they followed up the next day to see how he was and if we needed anything. At checkout we were assisted with our luggage. Thanks for a lovely stay! We will return!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: This stay exceeded our expectations.
desc: Love everything! Excellent choice! We arrived at the hotel early in the morning from an overnight flight. The receptionist was kind enough to allow us a early check-in as she understood the logistics of long haul international travel times. Fabulous location, just near DT line Telok Ayer, and walking distance to China Town and lot other attractions. Absolutely stunning views from our room on the 17th floor. The rooms were very spacious and had everything you needed and comfy beds and pillows. We were impressed with services provided from arrival till departure. All the service staff are polite and helpful. The whole experience was awesome. Would highly recommend staying at this hotel and we will be back again for sure! Thank you perfect CLAN!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel for Chinatown
desc: Great views of the city, comfortable and relaxing, nice layout of room with big spacious bathroom. Would recommend. We had tea and snacks upon arrival and they provided calming oil and more tea for the evening.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Holiday
desc: Awesome place to stay, very central and only small walks to great eateries. Chicken Satay late night room service meal was better than some of the restaurants meals we had and none of those were bad. Definitely will stay here again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall amazing
desc: Booked this hotel a day before I arrived and didn‚Äôt expect anything. Highly recommended for anyone who loves convenience and accessibility as it‚Äôs just opposite the train station. Good customer service, comfy and clean room.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good value for money
desc: Excellent service with beautiful rooms and style. Really enjoyed our Honeymoon in Singapore and staying at this hotel. They also left a cute note congratulating us, which is very sweet. Little details in the hotel show they really care for their customers.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Honeymoon Stop over
desc: Excellent welcome and service throughout. It was a layover before Bali and could not have enjoyed the evening better. Local area is fantastic with great food nearby. We used the subway also to get to the light and water show. Very easy, beautiful people welcoming us as their own üòä

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Good service and excellent hospitality. Breakfast choices were great. Desirable room top pool. But check in may be friendly for older guests or guests with mobility challenges as one needs to carry luggage up a few steps. Without hotel key card, one can‚Äôt use the ramp at the opposite end of the building

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: We Will Stay Here Again Next Time
desc: The hotel is clean and modern, and the location is perfect. It is right next to the MRT station and walking distance to Chinatown. The breakfast is a la carte menu with kaya toast and fruits provided. We enjoyed the chefs daily special and daily porridge. We will definitely stay here again next time when we visit Singapore.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great new hotel
desc: I‚Äôm a sucker for an infinity rooftop pool and this place definitely didn‚Äôt disappoint. Great central location with a metro station directly across the street and within easy walking distance to the marina area. Staff were extremely friendly and room was immaculate. Would definitely stay here again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Number 1
desc: The hotel is in 100% good conditions. Toilet have the black marble like which is what I‚Äôm searching for. Feels like Im in modern ancient china. The theme suits my taste and the quality of the toiletries is extremely good. Thanks for the stay.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Form without substance
desc: Spend 1 night to do a staycation. First impression of the hotel was quite positive, modern and personal. Positive vibe short lived. At check-in, confirmed reservation was not in the system. Had to wait 2 hours. A nice touch provided, was served a cup of brewed green tea and a slice of mooncake to celebrate the occasion (Mid-autumn festival). Being a Sunday, almost all the shops and eateries were closed. If venturous, hotel pretty close to Chinatown and infamous Lau Pa Sat, street be closed to vehicular traffic and `roadside stall' fanning their satay delight from 6pm. Room quite well appointed, standard amenities. At 9.30pm, decided to order snack. In-house phone was on Twilight Zone mode. Dialed room service...NO Answer. Dialed Housekeeping...NO Answer. Dialed Concierge...No

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best hotels in Singapore!
desc: Fabulous Hotel and couldn‚Äôt recommend more. The rooftop pool is amazing. Everything in the room is so well thought out and luxurious. All of the staff were exceptional and friendly, with a delicious breakfast. One of the best hotels in Singapore!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan is perfect.
desc: The Clan was perfect! The staff were attentive, friendly and helpful and the building is comfortable and very cool! I loved the secret feel of the entry and the history lesson you got in the lifts. Having the pool and gym on the 30th floor have is a great view of the city. Great location too.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent staff service and nice amenities!
desc: Great location with many alternative of food around us. Most importantly, excellent staff service and one of the nicer and comfortable hotel for staycation in Singapore. Amenities are modern and relaxing too. Special thanks to Joyce from the front desk for her kind and sweet gesture to offer us a mini cake as it was the anniversary for my husband and I that day too. She even offer to recommend us place for dinner too: thanks for the great experience by the team!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay and location
desc: Great stay and good location. Service was friendly and I enjoyed the filtered water tap in our room. The whole building smelled like nice tea and was well decorated. It was abit hard to find because the entrance is black and hidden around the walls but reception was very helpful.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: AMAZING!
desc: The Clan Hotel is nothing short of an amazing experience, located just near China Town and close to bars, restaurants & the MRT. Prepare to be spoilt by the most hospitable staff who are courteous, friendly and amazing. The roof top infinity pool is also a treat! The rooms are spacious with a very very comfortable bed and the bathroom sensational with Japanese TOTO Toilet :) The Clan Hotel has everything you need for an amazing stay in Singapore 5 Star Accommodation!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel
desc: I can highly recommend this hotel. Perfect service, nice architecture and great location. We stayed 5 nights and travelled with a 4 months old baby, even as a family hotel it is the best possible choice. I can not wait to check in again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Relaxing Stay
desc: Perfect location and centrally located in China Town. The room was clean, soft bed, great views and had great amenities. The staff were so helpful and lovely. We were also welcomed with a Tea Ceremony. Would definitely come back!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: You can't ask for a better hotel and Clan Keeper
desc: This is the best hotel I've stayed at in Singapore. It's beautiful, modern, has a fantastic roof top pool, and most importantly, you are welcomed by some of the friendliest and dedicated staff I've experienced. The Clan Keeper, Sam, and his team WILL look after you from check in to check out. One of the truely rare hotel experiences where you feel genuinely welcome and part of The Clan. Five stars all day long.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 3 Week Business Stay
desc: Very clean, tidy hotel with excellent staff. A fabulous location close to all major Singapore attractions, MTR, China town and Lau Pa Sat food centre. The pool and Gym are both on the 30th floor offering good facilities and great views. The Hotel is in the upper price bracket however the convenience of its location makes it well worth the outlay.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best hotel in Singapore
desc: One of my best staycation I had. This hotel met every aspect of my expectations. In term of cleanliness, staff‚Äôs attitude, services, they did well and done much better than what most 5 stars hotels I been to. Love the pool and gym. Awesome view! If I must pick on, just the bed and pillows. The bed is a bit too soft for my liking. If they have a pillow menu for guest, I think this hotel is perfect Locations is great, walkable distance to 3 different lines. Lots of local food, Korean food, cafes around. I will definitely go back for staycation again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A new & modern hotel at a superb location
desc: Stayed in The Clan for 6 nights. It's a new hotel which is very strategically located very close to CBD & Chinatown. Telok Ayer MRT station is just 50 meters away & Raffles Park about 400 meters. Boat Quay 5 mins walk. The rooms are spacious & modern. The staff was very courteous & helpful. Breakfast is something which requires attention. There's a lack of variety & items are repetitive. Apart from that it's a hotel worth every penny.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A perfect city escape.
desc: We have been to Singapore many times and The Clan Hotel was by far the best place we have stayed. We could not fault any of the staff. Friendly and helpful people. The location is perfect. A short cab ride to everywhere we wanted to go. Chinatown is the coolest, city holiday we‚Äôve had. We love this place and it‚Äôs people.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best service hotel in SG
desc: Best service hotel in Singapore. with the best staffs, best location, best room with good cleanliness, best gym and swimming pool with best city view of Singapore. Premium drinking water also served at the room.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel to stay.
desc: I enjoyed staying at the CLAN hotel. However, if there is bathtub arrangement in hotel room, could be better. The service that provided hotel authority was very nice and all the guys are very cooperative.! I love Clan hotel!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect luxury location in Singapore
desc: This beautiful hotel is centrally located. The rooms are immaculate. And the service is incredible. I got a basic room and it was beautiful, with a great view, on a corner so I had light from two sides. I also have never had customer service this good anywhere else. I highly recommend.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Central Singapore
desc: We were able to walk to most of the places we wanted to visit as as The Clan is central. Otherwise the tube station is very close so we hopped on that. Rooms aren't big but adequate so the great location wins.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A very stylish hotel
desc: From their main gate to room, ground floor to top floor, every bit has been well designed. With some artefacts placed throughout the hotel, it creates a historic atmosphere that well suited to its name and founding story. Last but not least, their welcome gifts are generous.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: First visit to Singapore
desc: Loved The Clan Hotel. Hotel and staff exceeded our expectations and location couldn‚Äôt have been better. Friendly, professional, approachable staff . As we had a late departure from Singapore our luggage was safely stored for us so that we could enjoy our final day and allowed us to use showers etc before our onward journey.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best 5 Star hotel in Singapore ! Central location!
desc: This hotel had everything and was very central to everywhere! Friendly staff and quick service! I had a wonderful time! The gym and pool were an added bonus ! We arrived earlier than our check in time and they were able to store our bags.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: No bed for my child
desc: I booked this hotel via Travel Republic for 2 adults and an 8 year old son. Ie 3 people. (He‚Äôs the same height as me!) When we arrived the room had a double bed and no pull out or settee or any form of soft area to make into a bed. We were told he had to sleep in with us. All children 0-12!!!!! had to sleep in the double bed. After a 13 hour flight we couldn‚Äôt believe that the room we had booked for 3 was actually for 2 with no alternative. No other rooms available and no extra beds available. One of us had to sleep in the floor as the bed certainly didn‚Äôt fit 3. I‚Äôve complained to Travel Republic who when complaining told me they knew the response would be ‚Äúsorry nothing we can do‚Äù It‚Äôs false advertising. It‚Äôs taking money for something they aren‚Äôt providing. It should be

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel but don't expect the bar to be open
desc: Overall a decent hotel. The check in process was easy and enjoyed the tea ceremony. The room itself was clean and comfortable, the shower was excellent. There was a bit of lack of hanging space and the room was a little on the small side and felt a bit cramped with all the luggage. Gym and rooftop pool were great. Hotel it in a pretty decent location for getting out and about. Breakfast was good, nice selection, good service, and always no problems getting a table etc. My one issue with this hotel is the bar / restaurant. Our first night we went out to explore and came back to the hotel to see if we could get a bite to eat at the hotel restaurant or bar. Both the restaurant and bar were booked out for a private event. So there was no on site facility for guests that night. The

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A taste of Asia in a lovely package
desc: We had a great two night stay at The Clan Hotel in Singapore prior to a 14 day Southeast Asia cruise. The hotel is modern, very well situated on the edge of Chinatown, and right next to the MRT. Check in was very efficient. Our schedule during our stay was very busy so we had very little interaction with the staff. However, what interaction we did have, check-in, check-out and breakfast, everyone we encountered was very warm and welcoming. We arrived in the evening so we never did the tea ceremony. They offered to let us come the next day but we were busy seeing the city. We had a Grand Premier room on the 27th floor. This room is a corner room with views in two directions. All the amenities that come with the Grand Premier room make your stay feel very special. We

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice place to stay in Singapore
desc: Rooms are clean and quiet. Enjoyed the stay in the Clan. Great location with proximity to food and dining as well as popular attractions. Staff are courteous and responsive. Will pick the Clan for my next visit.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful Hotel!
desc: Absolutely beautiful hotel!! We were able to only stay one night and definitely wish we could stay more. Definitely opt to watch the tea ceremony upon check in. Great location to Maxwell hawker station. We walked to gardens by the bay too, about 25-30 mins. Pool is open late and opens up to an amazing view.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing!
desc: We stayed at the clan hotel for 3 nights. The cleanest hotel I‚Äôve ever stayed in - amazing views from our hotel room and also got upgraded - staff are great, overall lovely experience would 100% return. Breakfast was average but we weren‚Äôt too fussed about that.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good, but disappointing
desc: I had 4 nights at The Clan Hotel in mid February. I liked the location of this hotel and found the room to be well appointed and bed comfortable. I enjoyed using the pool and gym facilities. All in all, it was a good place to stay and met my needs. My room rate included a buffet breakfast, which I was expecting might be al a carte based on other reviews, but was indeed a buffet. Regretfully the food quality was so poor I only stoped there one morning before finding a local cafe where I could get something nice for breakfast. The buffet was limited and food was unpalatable if not inedible. I also had one day where the room was not made up, I expect staffing is tight as it is globally, so can overlook this, although not rates do not reflect the diminished service experienced as a

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Pretty terrible, really
desc: We ultimately paid $1538.55 (USD) for 1 night stay at the Clan Hotel, and we were falsely charged an additional $74.55 (USD) for products or services we did not use. Know this. If you book a room at the standard (non-refundable) rate, the ownership will 100% enforce all charges, regardless of circumstance. We are seniors and traveled a great deal in our lives and this is the first time we have seen this ever. Family emergency? It doesn't matter. Cancelled flight? Forget it. They will take your money and it won't matter why you didn't show up. And that is not all. For having paid for a room for 4 days, it wasn't even clean. Fodo crumbs on the couch surfaces. Floors dirty. Coffee and water rings (many) on the stone and wood surfaces. Coffee stains (many) on small

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: FABULOUS HOTEL AND BRIALLANT LOCATION!
desc: We arrived at the Clan Hotel after a long trip from the UK and were not disappointed! The staff were friendly and helpful for check-in and looked after our bags as our room was being cleaned (we had arrived at 8am), we went off to explore the wonders of Singapore. The room was fab, we stayed on the 25th floor and had a great view of the singapore sky line. Ample space in both the room and bathroom with plenty of storage and we even had a toilet which opened and closed automatically! Both the fitness centre and pool were on the 30th floor, giving you some great views for a workout, swim, or lounge in the hot tub. Breakfast had a large selection for those who prefer western options but also for those who want to try the Singaporean style. Location is always key in a city and

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good boutique style hotel
desc: Good hotel, good experience generally, very satisfied. Travellers might still need to note a few things. The room was smaller than you'd get in a hotel further away, though it fits the boutique hotel model, and my request was for twin beds, which makes things a bit tighter. The breakfast was fine, if not comparable with the glorious mega buffets you'd find in bigger hotels and chains. Breakfast is basically European with some East Asian options available. You might also want to note that you can walk around the corner to a popular street of coffee shops and food stalls. But the price of the breakfast wasn't unreasonable, and I'm not complaining. You also get a great view thrown in. You might also note that the entrance to the hotel has five steps up to the lifts, and thus isn't

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay Experience at The Clan Hotel Singapore
desc: Our firm had attended to a convention nearby and all associates and partners were fortunate enough to be tagged along by the managing partner for a short leisure stay at Singapore. Was fortunate enough to get a room all to myself so overall the stay was really enjoyable for me. Hotel was great overall from cleanliness to location. Can't comment on the cost as our stay was covered by our generous managing partner.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very satisfied
desc: Overall satisfied with the stay, very clean and new room. Amenities were good and new too. Service was quick, very friendly and helpful. Did not try the breakfast but will definitely go back for it. Thank you for the wonderful experience

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: LOVE everything about this hotel
desc: I reserved the hotel for a business trip as it was recommended online. Stayed in the Premier room, very modern design. The location is great and the staff are very friendly and helpful. They offered me welcome tea after the check in which I find it very unique, not all hotel does that. I will definitely be back again and stay with The Clan!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent hotel but‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..
desc: Stayed at this hotel for 4 nights, and it confirmed the thoughts of others that stayed and reviewed, and on which I had researched before booking. Pros: location, in the very heart of the area which is growing with small cafes restaurants and bars, try Far East Square. Comfortable room, stayed on 27th floor, grand premier room, had breakfast everyday, good selection. Comfy bed and excellent bathroom and rain head shower. Quiet rooms. Close to MRT x 2 lines. Short walk to Chinatown. Cons: this is a business/affluent traveller hotel, not a resort, the type u drop yr bags at and come back to sleep, eg pool area is limited to 10 guests. Value for money - book early to save. Staff are very good attentive but service is cool. There is no street level reception, is on 2nd floor and

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Trendy, great location
desc: We booked this hotel as a fill in for two nights but wished we had stayed longer. It is in a brilliant location amongst some historical Singaporean sites and Chinatown as well as some of the best foodie type areas of the city. The hotel is relatively new, is modern and trendily decked out throughout. It‚Äôs not a big hotel but the right size for a relaxing stay. Great cocktails at the Qin bar. Our room, a Grand Premier King, had all the right fittings and accessories and a really comfortable bed. One negative was the lack of bench spaced in the ensuite but not a big problem for a few days. It had the best shower recess we have ever experienced. Staff were all professional and helpful. Will stay again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: I recommend the accommodation at The Clan Hotel
desc: All the staff I interacted with were very kind and I was pleasantly impressed. I liked it because the room was very clean, the coffee in the room, the pool on the 30th floor, the metro station was very close. Gardens by the Bay can be reached after a pleasant 15-minute walk. would have liked more fruits for breakfast.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and a lovely hotel
desc: The Clan has a great location. Easy walking distance to Chinatown, Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay. The room was very eco friendly but the downside was there wasn't a wardrobe or drawers for unpacking our suitcases so we had to leave the cases on the benches so had no where to sit. The bathroom was excellent.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clan Hotel experience
desc: üëçüëçüëçAlthough it was 2D1N stay, it was really an enjoyable and memorable stay. We tried all the facilities and enjoyed it. The proximity to Sentosa is another plus point. The scenery view is great, amongst the tall buildings.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hotel in Singapur
desc: We enjoyed the two nights in this new hotel. We stayed in room 2601 (26. floor) with beautiful views. The hotel room is equipped with the latest gadgets (automated toilet) and a excellent bed . Breakfast is great. Just around the corner of the hotel you will find bars and restaurants.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Tea Haven in Downtown SIN
desc: Good hotel, centrally located to some amazing eateries and cocktail bars on the downtown side. We stayed 3 nights and stayed on the 10th floor corner suite. The tea experience on arrival is a nice touch although a little underwhelming compared to the descriptor in the promotional materials. Hotel is beautifully styled in and outside of rooms. Room was comfortable for two and beds and ensuite comfortable and meeting requirements. First night mini-bar complimentary and a nightly bed time tea as part of turn down service a nice touch. Pool big enough to enjoy but up to 10 people only. My rating dropped mostly due to the housekeeping shortfall in terms of replenishing in-room items and timely room cleaning. We would leave early in the am after breakfast ( which was nice and

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant Hotel in great location
desc: I had an almost flawless stay in a perfectly located rather new hotel. MRT right around the corner. China Town, CBD and the Quays in short walking distance. Even Marina Bay area is easily reachable by foot. Room, Grand Premier Room, met all my expectations, was clean and spacious. Housekeeping reliable and friendly. Straff at reception very friendly and helpful. Getting a paid for (20 SGD per hour) late check out was no problem. Breakfast was a little disappointing especially regarding Western options wtih only little variety of choices to choose from. Staff at breakfast very attentive and proactive. However i would chose The Clan Hotel again in an instant, All in all great value for the price compared to similar 5-star hotels.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A good stay
desc: Great location, well connected to a lot of local places. My stay here was comfortable and convenient. The room was clean and the hotel staff were very helpful during the check-in and check-out processes.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: Had the best time in Singapore because of this hotel's amenities and services. Location is superb, near to everywhere and situated next to a subway (blue line). I look forward to stay in this hotel again when I visit Singapore again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful hotel next to Chinatown
desc: Nice hotel with a beautiful, new gym and infinity pool. The weights in the gym were a bit limited but there was a wide variety of machines available. The rooms were a bit small but clean and had everything we needed. Would recommend staying here!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice stay
desc: Very nice boutique hotel with all amenities and extraordinary rooms. The hotel offers a bathroom area where you can take a shower if you have a late flight and already checked out, which is a strong plus. Pool area and breakfast restaurant were too small for the size of the hotel. Nighttime was a bit noisy because of a party or festival outside.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing ü§©
desc: Amazing hotel, better than anything else in Singapore. The Clan is in the perfect location right in Chinatown, you are right on the doorstep of all the food and attractions yet the hotel in quiet and tranquil in your room.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean comfortable modern
desc: double bed a little small/short for me. Gym is spacious and has some variety in it. Elevator is fast, room has nice city views. I would say its a solid 4 star hotel. You won‚Äôt feel cheap (interior decorations etc..)

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Love it!!
desc: The Clan is perfectly located with a MRT right across the street. There‚Äôs also a lot to do and see within a walkable distance of the hotel. Overall our stay was great and the rooms were nice and comfy. Would 100% recommend for anyone looking for a place to stay in Singapore.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect location and comfortable
desc: Such an incredible hotel. The room was clean and comfortable, the pool and gym was excellent, breakfast was perfect and the location was ideal. If you like being close to the heart of Singapore and value being close to good hawker centres for food this can‚Äôt get any better than where the clan is. The building itself is stunning and the style is something I‚Äôve never seen before. Hats off to the team here who make it such a nice experience.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A memorable experience
desc: Very good Location, fast and high quality service, exceptional cleanliness, friendly staff (particularly the housekeeping and concierge staff), very high quality food.... All of this helped make our trip a memorable experience.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice Hotel To Stay
desc: Near by MRT station, it just 2 minutes by walk The room was clean and have great bath room. The hotel staff was friendly and helpful The hotel was near with Singapore CBD area and nice to stay for business trip

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Modern Singapore
desc: Modern, spartan and interesting decor and the walk in shower was great. Excellent and efficient services were provided. It‚Äôs in a great location to nearby eateries. Within walking distance to new and older food centers and sights.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Upscale and convenient to everything!
desc: This is my go to hotel in Singapore. Wonderful rooms, attentive staff, and a great location. I‚Äôve stayed there twice on business for as long as 40+ days at a time and recommend it highly. The entire staff went out of their way to make sure I had everything I needed.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A beautiful and excellently located hotel. Truly 5*
desc: We spent a wonderful two nights at the Clan for our first trip to Singapore. Firstly location, we found it excellently located. We arrived via Metro with the Telok Ayer station just a 2-minute walk away. It was also a short 5-minute walk to Lau Pa Sat, a delicious and very affordable local food hall. We also walked to Marina Bay Sands in 20 minutes or you can cycle or get a direct Metro. We arrived very early for our reservation but were able to check-in to our Grand Premier Room about 2 hours early which was much appreciated after a long flight. I‚Äôll say now that all staff were tremendously helpful and really did offer 5* service. The room was sensational and really seemed good value at what you can pay elsewhere in Singapore. The double-aspect view was glorious (we were on

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, excellent location right across from MRT, modern and comfortable
desc: This hotel is wonderfully modern,but with traditional Singaporean delights, like tea and biscuits wrapped in cloth awaiting you n your room, a welcome tea service, the room comes with nespresso machine for your early coffee fix, beautiful bath with bubble bath supplied, touch buttons to draw the curtains, the bed is so comfy also, the pillows Devine. Breakfast is quick and buffet quite good. Swimming pool on top floor great and very cool, hopped from cool pool to very warm spa, and back again...worked great on recovering worn out legs fro all the walking around town... Lift was great and very quick, conceige helpful, all staff friendly and efficient... Rate this hotel right up there with the best

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A taste of The Clan
desc: The Clan has always been my choice of hotel in Singapore. Some people might say it's not as convenient as staying near Orchard Rd but I personally thinks this location is just perfect. Short distance to Chinatown, Hong Lim Hawker Center, Maxwell Hawker Center etc. A simple 10-15 mins car ride will get you to Orchard if public transport is not your cup of tea. Service wise, it's impeccable. Breakfast has fantastic variety and taste good. Front desk is courteous and helpful. This stay in April, I got welcomed by the Tea ceremony master, Darren (hope I got the name right) and he was just magnificent. Room is not as spacious as s lot of the western hotels BUT definitely enough space and won't make you claustrophobic. Amenities provided are unique to the clan, such as the tea and

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful overall experience in a heritage district of Singapore
desc: Gr√©√¢t exp√©rience overall. The hotel was well designed, rooms were large, had great amenities like the rooftop pool and gym. Staff were wonderful too, especially Joyce who took us on a heritage walk around the neighbourhood! We also took a calligraphy class that was part of the room package which was really fun and in line with the hotel's overall design aesthetic. The only gripe I had was dinner at their in house restaurant, Qin, where the meal (part of the package) was not great. Probably a 3 star rating for the food, including partially raw fish in the boulli√ªabase. I think it was a good attempt at curating a special menu but might have been better if they stuck to the best sellers instead.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean and high service
desc: We stayed 2 nights and enjoyed all the services available (gym and rooftop). Though there is not many places available in the rooftop pool, there were not so many people during our stay. The hotel is clean and staff is polite. We attended the tea ceremony Hich was really nice. The hotel has a good location near restaurant and bars as well as near Chinatown. Did not take the breakfast in the hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: From the check-in experience to the rooms and roof top pool, The Clan is the best Hotel I have stayed at in recent times. The staff are very attentive and everything you need is within easy reach. The roof top pool and a great way to relax after a long flight.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Hotel stay
desc: All very good really helpful staff breakfast we had a good choice and the 2 course lunch was very delicious especially the salmon we will definitely booking the clan on our next to Singapore because of the service and location and the great staff

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: Room is great, it has good location!! Close to several MRT station, also there are several great restaurants near by. Service is good, it can deposit luggages, hotel will help move your luggage to your room when your room is ready. The whole hotel has the fragrance of tea, which makes people relax.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Thank you the staff at The Clan Hotel making it a pleasant Birthday Staycation. Staff were friendly during the check-in, was asked to wait at the lobby for a tea to be served. The hotel room is spacious and clean. The facilities were great too. Totally love the Sky pool and Gym where you can have the city view. Spent a quiet evening in the pool. As I have stated that it was a staycation for an advance birthday celebration, the hotel actually delivered a cake to the room for the celebration. Really enjoyed my stay and would recommend for those who are traveling as Chinatown and Marina Bay Sands are just within walking distance.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel. Horrible in-room lighting.
desc: Overall - it was great. Very comfortable room, lovely staff, nice breakfast, great rooftop pool, fabulous location near Chinatown, hawker centres and MRT. All perfect. Except.... The lighting in the room was awful. It was truly one of the silliest things I have ever seen in any hotel anywhere. OK - maybe we were a bit over-tired after a long-haul flight from London - but when one wants to put the bedside lamp on so one can read without disturbing one's partner - one doesn't expect to have to then turn on the TV to scroll through pages of advertising drivel to find the instructions for a lighting console that seems more at home on the space shuttle. Need a wee in the middle of the night? Good luck. The light switch isn't where you would expect to find it - all the lights

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: First class Location, Amenities and Staff
desc: Great hotel located in a perfect position in Singapore, adjacent to a good little area with restaurants and bars. It is situated right next to the MRT stop (Metro) if you need to move around the city. The rooms were great, good size, fantastic views, comfy beds and pillows. Highly recommended especially with such a courteous and efficient staff. I'll be back!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic new hotel in a great location
desc: Fantastic new hotel in a great location - just a stone's throw from Telok Ayer MRT and a few minutes' walk from Chinatown. The staff were great too. We booked a Premier Double Room and requested a high floor corner room which we were granted. The room had a great view over Chinatown to one side and the Business District Skyscrapers to the other. Breakfast was delicious and had plenty of vegan options for my wife.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: The Clan Hotel is the best place to stay in Singapore: the location is perfect (10 meters to the metro station, near Chinatown and many delicious places where to eat) and the staff is just great. Darren was a fantastic host, making us a charming tea ceremony and making us feel at home in the wonderful lobby. The pool has a fantastic view, and was never crowded. The breakfast was very good and the rooms equipped with Japanese wc, good hairdryer and all you need. We would definitely come back again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent in all respects.
desc: Very nice hotel and room, nothing out of place and good attention to detail. Early check-in can never of course be guaranteed but they found me a room which was a great relief after a sleepless overnight flight. Would ge back there again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Business Trip
desc: Great location and clean. Easy to get around from here. If you are coming for business or vacation and this would be a great location. I will come back again to stay here next time. Stay toon for more

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Stay
desc: Stayed here for a week during a business trip to Singapore, and everything was absolutely top-notch. The room was clean and well appointed, a delicious breakfast was included, and the staff really went out of their way to assist. This property is very conveniently located, directly across the street from the Telok Ayer MTR station, and backing onto Far East Square with its eclectic collection of shops and restaurants. It is across from the heritage Chinatown district, a short walk to the Lau Pa Sat hawker food stall market, and only two short MTR stops to the Marina Bay Sands Convention Centre. The gym is well equipped, and although I did not use the outdoor pool, it looked very nice. Would definitely recommend to anyone wishing to stay in Singapore for business or pleasure.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommend hotel!
desc: The staffs are helpful even I lost something here, and they also assisted for my weird reservation email of my next hotel, tried their best to make my trip smoothly. And the location is really convenient and it‚Äôs really close to airport And the swimming pool is nice

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Top Choice Hotel in Singapore
desc: Love the charm of this hotel. Amazing friendly staff greeted me at the entrance that guide me to level 2 where the check in counters are. Check in was a breeze. They even hand written the welcome card. And you must take time to experience the Tea Ceremony. Super relaxing! Would like to specially affirm Jonathan from AM and housekeeping staff who return me my SD memory card after i checked out, which I left on the table. They even kept it in the beautiful "The Clan' envelope. Very detail and professional. Thumbs up! The bed was extremely comfortable. The room was spacious and clean. The aesthetics were awesome. Beautiful view of the town greeted me in the evening and the next morning. Definitely will come back for more workcation stay!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clan is a great hotel and location
desc: Our 5 night stay was terrific and beds oh so comfortable. The location was also great being close to an MRT station. The concierge were so helpful too. Close to a bunch of of hip restaurants and china town, so could walk everywhere.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Super experience at The Clan!
desc: From arrival to departure my stay at The Clan was excellent. The staff are friendly and helpful, the hotel is well appointed and immaculate and the location is perfect. I recommend this hotel and I will definitely be back!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: perfect for a city trip
desc: very good location, it was very clean, the rooms are small but functionally, the bathroom has a good equipment with automatic toilet, there is also drinking water access. And the staff was very helpful and friendly.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very luxuous place to stay
desc: Wonderful place - everything!!! The hospitality and the attendance are sore careful. It is close to the subway. Fantastic!!! The breakfast are complete, a lot of foods, juice, breads, etc. I realy like and reccomend this hotel in Singapore

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Quality hotel
desc: Great location , good quality room and welcoming staff. The hotel has a small pool on the top floor which gives an outstanding view of the surrounding area. The rooms are well furnished and the bed comfortable

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hotel for a city break in Singapore!
desc: Excellent hotel, great location and beautiful room with an amazing view. We requested a room on a high floor which I would really recommend. The service was fantastic and the room was really clean with great amenities. Breakfast was great every morning. My husband also loved the pool and gym, they are located on the top floor and have an amazing view, the equipment is excellent as well.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: SUPERB
desc: My bff won a lucky draw stay here and bestowed to me instead for my birthday. The best experience started right when we checked in. Had welcome tea and tau sar piah during check in. When we went into our room, we were greeted with complimented refreshments and specially curated tea. Couldn‚Äôt finish and brought back home. We had a great and relaxing time at the pool and the gym is very well equipped. It was my toddler and my birthday and Joanne (Guest Experience Executive) arranged for turn down service and surprise bday cake, balloon sculpture and colouring book for us. Also included tea which helps with sleep. That night all of us slept early and like a baby as the pillows and mattress were really comfy. Beauty rest indeed. Was lucky to be given early check in and late check

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome stay
desc: The room was comfortable and clean the food was good and the roof top swimming pool was amazing. Easy check in, easy check out, it's in a great location in Singapore, the staff were helpful and friendly

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect for first time visitors to Singapore
desc: Great staff who are very focused on customer service, modern quality decor and atmosphere, perfect location with closest MRT less than a minute's walk away. Loved the pool on the 30th floor - rarely overly busy. Would recommend/ return again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel in the heart of Singapore!
desc: Wonderful hotel. Lovely views, great service and perfect location. Perfect for walking if you are up for in the Singapore heat! Nothing is too far away and no request is too much for the staff. On your last day you can store luggage of course but also take a shower in the shower suites so you are fresh for your flight - great feature. Lovely pool with amazing views as well! Only downside: I don‚Äôt think they hoover or mop the rooms everyday. I had a dress with many tassels which unfortunately left the tassels everywhere I went. There were lots of little blue threads on my floor and after housekeeping came, they were still on my floor! Another downside which is not really the hotel‚Äôs fault - the pool doesn‚Äôt have enough sun loungers for how busy it gets on certain Days. Also

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good quality
desc: The location's fantastic. It's close to MRT (about 100 meters) and surrounding with several nice restaurants in Chinatown. Staff're friendly and helpful. The room's new, modern, comfortable and clean.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Metamodernism
desc: The architecture, a blend of futuristic and traditional elements, with adequately equipped rooms. Great service from the staff, a decent restaurant, and gym/swimming pool offering breath-taking views. Overall, had a great experience.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Definitely Worth It!
desc: First of all, I would love to say the BIGGEST THANK YOU to Farah, the Asst. Manager. She was warm, kind, and welcoming. I was traveling with my mom as it was her big celebration trip after her cancer went into remission. She was super excited to go on this trip and The Clan team made her stay super memorable. From the attentive housekeeping staff to the on-site managers, we were given the best treatment - definitely a 5 star hotel with 10 star staff :) On a safety note, on our last night, the fire alarm went off and it turned out to be a false alarm, thank goodness! The engineering and safety of this hotel is topnotch! There were AEDs available, properly marked fire escapes, and fire trap doors were activated automatically when the alarm went off. The staff also explained

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Stylish - modern - comfortable!
desc: We stayed here for three nights and can highly recommend the hotel. It is a pretty new hotel and very modern and stylish. It focusses on essentials and quality. The staff is friendly and our room was great. The View was fantastic and the furnishing had everything you could possibly need for a stay in Singapur. The location of the hotel was also a plus, as we could reach many places by foot but also a MRT station was next to the hotel. The only thing we did not appreciate was, that they send you two E-Mails in advance to choose your favourite items for the minibar and upon arrival we got completely different snacks and drinks. This was not a real problem, but makes you wonder.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing ü§©
desc: Amazing hotel, staff are incredible and always super nice. Pool and spa is amazing. Breaky is yummy. Hotel is in great location. Rooms are nice. I stayed in both the smallest room and the largest room available. Worth the prices. I'll definitely come back to stay again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Value for money, property looks new
desc: i appreciate the response time in particular when i had problem with the toilet flush, given it was at mid nite. The In-house technician showed up in less than 10 mins which is super efficient. Rated A+ for this~

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 6 friends travelling
desc: Very centrally located. Staff were exceptional, very friendly and helpful especially Hung in customer service. Rooms were lovely and clean breakfast had a huge variety. Pool and gym very nice. Highly recommend.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Hotel Experience INTA
desc: I had a great hotel experience at The Clan Hotel. Clean, quiet, good service and breakfast have been key for my stay at this hotel. In addition, I was attended by nice and friendly staff. I hope to return to this hotel at some point. I shall definitely recommend it to others.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One week stay at the The Clan hotel for business purpose
desc: The Clan hotel is simply wonderful. The hotel has a sleek, luxurious style and the rooms are sufficiently spacious and very clean. Nice extra‚Äôs are the pillow menu, the drinks and crisps set and the tea that is provided every evening. Staff were also very friendly and helpful. The only points where we saw room for improvement were the lack of cosiness of the outside terrace and bar area. Also, there is not much daylight in the bathroom. Overall, superb hotel with a very good price/quality rate. Hopefully they keep it that way and then we will definitely be back.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing
desc: The lobby ambassador,Darren Chen, is so friendly and hospitable. He brewed the tea for me and introduced the local sightseeing places while waiting for the check-in. I will definetely come back and revisit Clan hotel again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A very satisfactory experience
desc: A very pleasant stay in this hotal very well located, central, close to a metro line leading to essential places. General atmosphere very gentle. The only regret is to find a minibar not stocked on our arrival

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay in The Clan
desc: First time visit to Singapore, chose this hotel based on location, reviews and fact it had a pool and a fridge in the room. Pros: location, room size, facilities, staff, cleanliness. Cons: sink in the room, no hotel information folder in room, pool area a bit small Couple stayed for 6 nights in a deluxe double room on the 28th floor; which was a great size for the week and spotlessly clean. Location was brilliant, walking distance to a couple of MRT stations, Chinatown, Clarke/Boat Quay and Lau Pau Sat hawker centre. Lovely special touches in the room including the welcome box with cookies inside and the welcome tea with cold towel was very welcome. The huge walk in shower was fabulous, but the sink is in the bedroom- which I personally dont like- but more and more hotels

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, great amenities
desc: Location is awesome, short walk to Chinatown, Marina Bay and Singapore river, multiple MRT stops within 5 mins. Service and checking was great, efficient if not overly friendly. Room was not huge, but spotless and had everything we needed, including a 52 inch TV! Great tea and coffee making facilities, bathroom well stocked if small. Great views of Singapore. Hotel has a gym (awesome) and an infinity pool (fantastic) on 30th floor, amazing city views. There‚Äôs also a bar (we never checked it out). We asked and received late checkout (1pm) and, for late flights (ours was at 9pm) we were able to use the pool, gym and shower facilities / locker rooms all afternoon, a really nice perk! Enjoyed our stay immensely, it‚Äôs a great hotel in a great location and the price is right
