hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice and convenient hotel
desc: Stayed 3 nights in Clan hotel. It locates just opposite to MRT station, which lift is located at the exit and no staircase is required while you get off from MRT to the hotel. The bed is very comfortable and the room size is fair so that you are able to open the luggage to pack your stuff. The swimming pool is very nice and open til 00:00. The gym has a big monitor so that you can choose the tutorial video to watch.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic place to stay in Singapore!
desc: Couldn‚Äôt recommend The Clan Hotel enough, a beautiful hotel, very modern, clean and quiet. It is in a great location, the metro is across the road and you‚Äôre also within walking distance to most places. There are some great restaurants, cafes and bars close by so you are spoilt for choice. The staff were all extremely friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend staying here and look forward to my next visit!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay
desc: It was a unique hotel with good facilities and design. But for the rate itself to the size of the room it is pricey. And the AC is a little low. The lights is dark for the mirror and no room for luggage spaces. Though the location is best area and near to other restaurants. it was a good stay though.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent choice
desc: The location is perfect. I was able to walk to so many hawker markets and sights that I wanted to visit. It is also across the street from a subway station and close to many other subway and bus lines. I would like to give a special thank you to Isaiah at the front desk. He was very helpful several times. For a hotel of this quality in a city like Singapore, the price was excellent.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location
desc: The location is excellent, it near SMRT, Satay Street and ChinaTown. A corner room at 29th floor, so can enjoy great Singapore view in two directions. Comfortable bed. But the washstand is small, a small area to place my beauty and skin care products.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel from every perspective
desc: Location of The Clan is amazing. It's close to 3 MRT stations and also most of the attractions are within walking distance. The hotel itself is very modern and cozy. Our room was on the 25th floor with amazing view. The staff were very helpful.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Uber-modern and beautifully designed
desc: The Clan is an uber-modern, beautifully sleek hotel high rise in Singapore's Far East Square, adjacent to Chinatown. It felt like staying in Nakatomi Tower! The view from our room on the 29th floor was incredible. Our king room was an exquisitely comfortable stay, and the bathrooms are beautifully designed. Room amenities include coffee and tea service, and there's an infinity pool on the rooftop. The location is great, so centrally located that everything is either walkable or a quick Grab ride away. Directly behind the tower is Far East Square, which has great restaurants, including vegan/veg restaurants. The Clan is a guaranteed beautiful stay while in Singapore!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A nice hotel but unremarkable
desc: We stayed here enroute to Europe for 2 nights. As we arrived early evening sadly missed out on the welcome tea ceremony. A nice property but we were a bit underwhelmed. Ours was a Premier room with King bed on a higher floor. Views were good, however room was smallish. Breakfast was disappointing as cooked food was luke warm. Property is in a good location, very close to China town & numerous restaurants.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very delightful stay!
desc: We had a delightful stay. The hotel is very new and modern with great location right next to subway. Staff were extremely friendly, and there was a pleasant aroma of incense in the room and lobby. Special thanks to Darren for the tea ceremony, the tea and snacks were delicious, and the story was interesting, Darren is very kind person

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: My wife & I stayed at The Clan Hotel recently for 2 nights on a stopover from Europe & to celebrate our anniversary. The service we received from the moment we arrived was first class. The staff were all very attentive, polite & pleasant to deal with. The room was spotless and the amenities excellent. The bed was very comfortable and the shower was great. The location of the hotel was good - close to Chinatown and within walking distance to the Merlion on Marina Bay & CBD. Overall, I would have no hesitation in recommending the Clan Hotel for a stay in Singapore.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and clean with a great location in the CBD
desc: Very good service as well. It's not inexpensive, but probably not out of line for the Singapore CBD. The room was very comfortable and had a refrigerator and a Nespresso machine. It would be nice to have drawers for clothes.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hotel
desc: The Clan hotel is central to everything, close to a train station, China Town, a Hop on Hop off bus is within 100 metres. This hotel is brand new, modern, fully equipped, and even has a Nespresso machine. Shower is huge, with a rain shower head. Electric toilet?! Never seen one before! Bed and pillows were extremely comfortable. Magnificent views from the 25th floor, with good block out curtains.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very modern, chic hotel in the perfect location
desc: I stayed here with my wife whilst on a week of business. As you arrive at the entrance you immediately get a sense that this place is special; like entering ‚ÄúThe Continental‚Äù in John Wick. The rooms are not huge but are incredibly well appointed & the bed incredibly comfortable. I had a corner room with huge views or the surrounding streets & offices. On the down side, the bar is soulless & expensive, the reception staff are maybe a little inexperienced, but everything else including the gym & location are absolutely spot on. We‚Äôll definitely stay again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Boutique hotel - great location
desc: Very good location, across the street from an MRT station for quick access around town. Short walk into cbd. Room was small (it is Singapore) but good fit out that had everything, great bed, great shower, small desk for emailing. Sadly it is easy to miss the friendly staff as reception is on level 2, doormen are great though.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan hotel - A perfect base to explore Singapore from
desc: Couldn‚Äôt be in a better location to access everything as a tourist. 30 seconds from Telok Ayer MRT, a short stroll to Chinatown and the CBD. 10-15 mins stroll down to the marina, perfect! Our first time in Singapore and we were blown away; the hotel just added to our experience and was a perfect base to explore from. Staff very efficient, hotel spotless. The welcome tea ceremony was unexpected and lovely. Room was spot on; lovely powerful shower and always hot water. The infinity pool, hot tub and gym have the most amazing views - go at sunset and you won‚Äôt be disappointed. Breakfast was plentiful with loads of choice and lots of attentive staff. And as a couple travelling without kids, it was pleasant to have not too many children milling about. I would return here in a

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Stay.
desc: Stay for 3 nights and it was an awesome experience. The hotel has its own uniqueness. Like the hidden door to the lobby. Was attended by receptionist Nur, very friendly and explain in details upon check in. Met Zydney, the manager. Friendly lady and makes you feels so welcome. And special mentioned to Hanny the Front Office Manager, she has made my stay very comfortable and hassle free. She has made it possible although my arrival was quite early. Very professional and friendly and very easy to communicate with. Love this place and will definitely be back for a great stay and awesome service. Well done The Clan!!!!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: great for a one night stay
desc: Modern, well-run central hotel near a historic river quarter that is nice for a walk and for eateries. You may be confused, as was I, by the light switches in the room, but that would not be a first for a hotel anywhere in the world.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Cool, Quiet Refuge In A Busy City.
desc: Beautiful, classy hotel, awesome staff, lovely spacious room with great city views. Rooftop infinity pool and large spa in a superb setting. Lovely bar and restaurant. Cannot fault a single thing about The Clan. Your cool, quiet refuge in a very busy city.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Convenient and Clean Hotel
desc: First visit to Singapore; we stayed at The Clan Hotel at the recommendation of a family member. Very clean, very accommodating staff. Close to local rail station but also very easy to get a cab and ride share. If you are a "walker" tourist--everything is walkable but remember to bring an umbrella for those unexpected Singapore showers!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing experience
desc: Highly recommended and would love to stay again, the pool was perfect temperature, and the spa was divine. The bed was amazing, and I had a phenomenal sleep. The breakfast had everything you could imagine and really attentive customer service. The only thing that was missing was alternative milks- only having soy or normal. On the whole amazing experience.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 5* treatment and hospitality
desc: Stunning hotel in a central location. Easy to get around to all amenities. The staff were courteous, kind and made the stay very pleasurable. Big thank you to Darren - hospitality made us feel very welcome.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Hotel
desc: Great addition to the Far East group, perfect for business or a quiet stay in the heart of the city. Not one for families with young children but great to stay at. Close to the MRT and not far from the river and Chinatown.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Location and pool
desc: Great location with 2 Mrt stations nearby. New build with an awesome pool with great views. The bedrooms were nice and very clean. The staff was young but professional and attentive. Only the AC was too cold for my taste. I would come back again if the price was reasonable.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: very good!
desc: I stayed at this hotel last week. I had a hard time in the hot weather in Singapore, but I had a satisfying trip thanks to the hotel. It listens to your requests well and is so clean that you can pick one of the best things about your trip to Singapore.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: My stay at The Clan
desc: Overall it was a very pleasant stay. Great room, and inclusions. shower, gym and other amenities were superb. service in the entrance by the drop off area can be more courteous and attentive. but overall great. also, I got sad when there were no RICE during breakfast. :( I'm asian, Singapore is asian.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: New, clean and stylish
desc: It's a new hotel, so it was very clean and comfortable. Service was kind too. There was a time when it was difficult to recognize the room card in the elevator. But other than that it was very good and I would recommend it.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding room
desc: I got corner room on 28th floor which was an experience to remember for very long time. An unforgettable view beginning from Marina Bay Sands area to business district, embedded into China Town. Just one word: WOW

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Homely place to stay
desc: Beautiful hotel located in a nice district in Singapore. The Lau Pat food court is just around the corner, very polite staff! The hotel has a beautiful lobby where you can enjoy a tea ceremony. Rooms are luxuriously decorated in a modern Japanese style with a convenient layout. Rooftop pool has a nice view and a small but well equipped gym.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A quality hotel in a great area
desc: The hotel is modern and stylish with well appointed rooms. It has a great pool, though with some space limitations. There are some nice individual touches with snacks and personalised turndown service. The hotel is in an excellent location near Boat Quay and Chinatown.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Satisfied at all.
desc: the rate, the location, room condition,the infinite pool, professional service of staffs, free tea and water All is perfect for trip in Singapore! I will greatly recommend this hotel to other people around me !

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan's Lobby Ambassador
desc: The efforts of Darren and the entire staff during our short stay helped make this a memorable experience for our first visit to Singapore. Darren's tea service was above and beyond expectations. I would thoroughly recommend the Clan to anyone visiting Singapore and will definitely book here again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Hotel in Singapore
desc: Beautiful, modern and luxury Hotel between Bayfront and Chinatown, right next to MRT-Station Telok Ayer. Surrounded by many Restaurants with food from Chinese, Korean, Indian, Thai to Italian, French, Western, etc. you will find everything. A Hawker Center is also just a 5 minute walk away.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Ariz.. thanks so much
desc: Ariz was very nice to us tea also very nice Ariz gave to us best memory of honeymoon If you have plan of travel in SG, I recommand this place Good room condition, swimming pool, gym.. most of all Ariz is always waiting for you

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Ariz Tea master she is very kind and helpful I feel so happy first time in Singapore and the hotel also nice view
desc: Ariz the Tea master she is very kind and helpful and explained well and pretty I feel so happy first time in Singapore and the hotel also nice view and clean as well and also convenient to other places

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Hotel in a great location
desc: Modern, beautiful, clean and excellent quality hotel. The amenities and comfort level is excellent. Unfortunately they do not have a suite, which makes business meetings and hosting of team members rather difficult.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Stay in Singapore
desc: We had a lovely time at the Clan Hotel Singapore. It was the start of my honeymoon and the experience was perfect for my wife and I. We only wish we stayed longer in the hotel because it was such a great experience.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Solo trip
desc: I love the concept of the hotel. Very impressed with the staffs services and their hospitality. Love these view I get when I‚Äôm swimming or gumming. The room was very comfortable and I am able to also select the type of pillows that best suit me.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A beautiful, traditional and modern hotel
desc: So far it is the best hotel, we ever have been in Singapore. Our room on the 27th floor included a stunning view on the skyscrapers in Singapore downtown. Waking up with that view is awesome. The rooftop pool and the 24-hour Gym on the 30th floor also offer a unique experience - especially in the evening and night. The breakfast-buffet was very good and offered a variety of food. If we have to criticise one thing, it‚Äôs the air condition at the restaurant that was a bit too strong and cold. But that doesn‚Äôt change our opinion on the hotel. The hotel is well located a few meters away from an MRT-Station. We have to point out the very kind personal. The experience we made is, that we felt treated really personally and not like in many other hotels. Especially the traditional

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore visit
desc: The Clan Hotel is clean and modern, really handy to many Restaurants and Bars. The trip from the airport is only 25 minutes. We only had our breakfast which was fine, not outstanding. Staff were really helpful. Pool is too small for the size of the Hotel and was very crowded, only enough loungers for 9 people. Overall a great stay.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent
desc: Excellent service and hospitality. I highly recommend this hotel for stay. The only thing is there are very less veg options which is unlikely for vegetarian people otherwise the overall experience was good for me

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Passionate Singapore
desc: We had a tea ceremony when we arrived the hotel. Ariz, the lady introduced the tea ceremony with great passion and is very willing to chat with us about the culture and the origin of the pastry and tea! Apart from the detail explanation, we could feel the warm hospitality from Ariz and the Clan Hotel, asking if we want to try some more of the pastry and blended oolong tea. Great start to my Singapore trip!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, modern and clean with a business-feel.
desc: We enjoyed our stay in the Clan hotel. Our room was very clean, modern with big windows. The breakfast buffet was big with a large variety of sweet and savory foods. We enjoyed using the beautiful gym and the pool and the staff was friendly. The only negative we can think of, was that they were offered early check in for an outrageous rate (which we did not end up taking). I would recommend this hotel for those looking for a modern, clean, centrally located hotel with a business feel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Tea ceremony Clan Hotel
desc: Ariz did the Tea Ceremony with us which was very nice. The tea comes with a pastry (very nice) and a towel to clean your hands before. Ariz was very nice and gave a Short history. My Room number was 1604.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: High end hotel with 5 Star staff in a fabulous location
desc: Fantastically located in the Asian square just by Chinatown. the MRT (Subway) just next door, so getting around to site see was very easy. The rooms were compact but in that smaller dimension they have jam packed with all of the 5Star facilities you could need. Complimentary WIFI. The cultural theme of the Hotel was Fabulous and the offering of joining in on a Tea ceremony was welcomed. The Guest Experience Manager "Sam" was totally focused on ensuring you had an experience not to be forgotten. His knowledge of the local area and Singapore was second to none. also walking distance to Lau Pa Sat and Satay St for the foodies

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: great location to explore Singapore
desc: Very new hotel in modern style with excellent service and a great position to visit Chinatown and to enjoy lots of different restaurants. We arrived very early but we got a room immediately and the opportunity to have breakfast. There is a small hot pool and a bigger cold one at the top. Just great for a stopover or for some days in Singapore. We would love to come back!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful 5 Stars Stay!
desc: Possibly the most luxurious feeling 5 star hotel I've stayed in for a Singapore staycaytion by far! The reception floor was an experience in itself, and the room was extremely comfortable, coming with a great view (even in the toilet) and amenities. I love the emphasis that The Clan places on tea, and the unique flavoured tea bags provided in our room were greatly welcomed. The toiletries are mostly lotus & osmanthus scented, which I really loved. I did not use the pool, though my partner did and enjoyed it greatly. I did go up there to take a look at the view too though, which was spectacular, especially at dusk. The location of the hotel is also amazing. We had lunch and dinner at great eateries nearby - there are many restaurants and a hawker centre nearby for choice. The

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A fabulous experience
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at the Clan. The staff are attentive and helpful. The room was comfortable and clean The food was excellent. The pool is a must try experience. The location is good for getting to all the tourists attractions. It‚Äôs located in the Chinese quarter, we recommend a trip to the street food market

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect Location and Modern Hotel
desc: The reviews are pretty spot on here. Clan Hotel is a great, modern property, perfectly situated above the Telok Ayer MRT station, next to Chinatown and Raffles Place. The building is like a black monolith that rises above Far East Sq and Amoy St. The lobby is on the 2nd floor and as all the pictures show, very well designed and decorated, with modern and traditional. Check in was easy and anyone waiting around can partake in the tea and pastry serving. There are 4 elevators and all are fast. Some nitpicks - the elevator bank on the 1st floor is up a few steps, which is strange for people carrying luggage from a taxi drop off. The other part of the 2nd floor is just another waiting area that looks bland compared to the main lobby. We stayed for 2 nights in a premier room. We got

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay at The Clan
desc: We had a wonderful stay at The Clan. The hotel is new, modern, clean, and in an excellent location. More importantly, the staff is excellent and the service is top-notch. They make you feel very welcome from the beginning and do everything to make you happy. Darren, in particular, and the female employee who checked us in (I feel terrible that I forgot her name, but she gave us amazing lunch recommendations), were incredible. We would highly recommend staying there.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clan Hotel review July 2023
desc: The Clan Hotel is a modern stylish hotel in the heart of Singapore‚Äôs Chinatown. Room was clean and bed comfy. Bathroom was a little on the small price but not unusual considering the hotel location. Best attribute of this hotel was the location, right next to Chinatown with the Telok Ayer MRT station right on the doorstep.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Hotel, one night stopover stay.
desc: We would highly recommend staying at the Clan Hotel. It was tastefully styled, reasonably priced and conveniently located. It was comfortable stay, with great beds and pillows. The pool and gym facilities looked great, although we didn't get a chance to use them. Would stay there again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel with wonderful staff
desc: We got into Singapore very early after a 12 hour flight. Was able to shower and use the lounge before check in. Held our luggage before and after check in. All staff super friendly and helpful. Rooms are good size and clean. Pool has great views and very useful cause its always hot in Singapore. The location is close to explore all the hawker markets and Chinatown. It was a 10 min taxi to the marina Bay Gardens or 25 min walk if the heat doesn't bother you. Would come back here anytime. 10/ 10

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay
desc: Very warm welcome by the staff and even got a birthday cake! Express checkout makes everything much more easier. Too bad that we didn‚Äôt get the chance to use the gym and swimming pool, but there is always a chance to come back again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional hotel !
desc: Magnificent hotel in a great location right next to a metro station and a stone's throw from China Town and the Merlion. Luxurious rooms, very comfortable beds and beautiful shower rooms. The swimming pool on the 30th floor is just magical with its view over the city. On the last day, they can store your luggage until you leave for the airport, and you can also take a shower, which is very pleasant before a long plane journey.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Stunning property
desc: The hotel is absolutely gorgeous and the location perfect. It is juxtaposed in the middle of old and new which seems to be something Singapore embodies so well. This was done very well at the Clan in the Chinatown neighborhood. Our check in was accommodated even though we were early which was so delightful and we did not expect. The tea service with I believe it was Darren, was such a nice touch. All the staff we encountered were just wonderful. Breakfast was very good and plentiful in options. The pool and gym area are stunning in their own right. My only criticism would be that our room turnover between the days was not consistent. Even though the room was cleaned the coffee was not replenished etc. so it was hard to tell what had been done vs not completed. A minor

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful 5 star stay
desc: We loved this hotel. From the doorbells on the room doors, to the incredible toilets (auto seat lift, heated seat and wash/dry options) and beautiful walk in rain showers. A full provision of wash amenities, free items in the mini bar and a traditional tea ceremony complete with tea, mooncake and washcloth, make this hotel incredibly special. The bed was super comfy and the pillows felt full and fresh. The breakfast had a lot of choice - from omelette station, to fruits, breads and pastries and cooked options, you won‚Äôt go hungry here. Staff are attentive and efficient. The pool was a little chilly, but the view more than made up for it. We loved the hot tub too. The Clan has a brilliant location too - right next to the MRT which is ridiculously easy to navigate. It‚Äôs also

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Must visit hotel if you are looking for something unique that combine modern luxury and old culture . It is close to eve
desc: Absolutely amazing !! Also Joanne has help us about everything!! We never had experience in a hotel like this before. We will visit this Hotel again without second choice. Breakfast 10/10 . Rooms 10/10 . About the service was so professional.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: Highly recommended, super loacated, smart modern hotel, comfortable beds, nice bathroom, near food market. If I come back to Singapur I definitely will stay at the clan hotel again. Pretty good experience.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel. Would stay here again
desc: The hotel was great! In a great location. The staff were very helpful with whatever we needed. The concierge were very helpful in getting us taxi's whenever we needed them. The room was comfortable. I especially like the heated toilet seat :) The pool was fantastic and had an awesome view of the city.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stay
desc: The stay was comfortable, service was excellent, staff was very professional and polite. The room was clean and the toilet bowl was the best, it‚Äôs got heater function on the seat, just like the one in Japan!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Experience
desc: I had a wonderful experience at the Clan Hotel. All the staff I encountered were delightful and willing to help, especially the tea master, Darren, Thank you! Will definitely come back and recommend to my colleagues and friends who wants to visit Singapore üëçüèª

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience, felt unique
desc: The staff at the Clan were very friendly and welcoming. We had the pleasure of sitting for the tea ceremony with Ariz who filled us in on the history behind it. I also had the pleasure of meeting Michael (Mike) who helped me with some great recommendations on restaurants around town. All in all, great stay at a place that felt like it had something a little unique to offer.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Tea Ceremony
desc: Ariz explained the history of the tea ceremony to us very patiently. The tea is very tasty, the mouth is smooth, not astringent, the pastry is hard on the outside and soft on the inside, you can feel the multiple taste, and you can feel the broad and profound Chinese food culture together with the tea.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience!
desc: I have a wonderful experience in here! Very warm welcome during check in with tea serving. It was great experience! Special thanks to Jonathan for the service! And also Darren the tea specialist! Definitely will come again with my family and friends next time!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: very good
desc: Wonderful experience at this hotel. The rooms were spacious with great views of the city, very quiet and very clean. I love the products on offer here (choice of 5 items before arrival, facilities, tea...) . The breakfast buffet has a wide selection and the food at Qin's is excellent. The pool is small, but the view is beautiful. Telok Ayer metro station is at the foot of the hotel. The location of the hotel is perfect, there are many restaurants, temples, Chinatown steps... A few small areas for improvement: It can be difficult to climb a few steps at the hotel entrance with heavy luggage (help would be nice); The air conditioning in the room is a bit noisy (maybe it's a setup problem?). The shower head is a bit leaky and there is no adjustable stand to position it. Anyway,

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Singapore Hotel!
desc: We stayed here for three nights and everything was wonderful! It is close to most things you want to do in Singapore with no taxi being over 10.00 anytime. The room was super clean and comfortable. The breakfast was good. Check-in and out was a breeze. Doormen would take care of bags, taxies, etc. I highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Yea ceremony
desc: The tea ceremony is very awesome, the tea and pastry are tasty. And the tea master Ariz is very nice and had shared us with the history of the tea ceremony. It‚Äôs a memorable experience at Clan Hotel in Singapore.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Well located, excellent hotel.
desc: Staff very helpful. Rooms clean and comfortable. Good views. Well located near to chinatown, but other attractions were a short walk, and MTR station nearby. Excellent pool although they try to limit numbers to 10 people at a time. Gym was good, but perhaps the air con could be a little cooler for those of us who go for it a bit. Overall, excellent and highly recommended.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 100000% recommended
desc: Had a lovely stay in clan hotel, the manager, Hanni went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable and anticipate what we needed. The location is quite convenient and the facilities are good. Again, thankyou hanni who welcomed us with warmth, friendliness, and a genuine sense of hospitality that made us feel like a home. Will definitely come again and recommend to my families and friends.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Overall, I had a great experience with Clan hotel. Front desk staff (Jonathan) is extremely pleasant and helpful!
desc: The best hotel I‚Äôve ever been privileged enough to stay in! What a gorgeous building, it gets more breathtaking when I walk in. The room is clean and it‚Äôs perfect hotel for getaway! I highly recommend this hotel for everyone visiting as here is a walking distance to China town and lots of good food nearby.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good access, view, and supre-sophisticated hospitality.
desc: Not only good access, and a clean room, they have so polite hospitality. I felt safe and comfort, and it made my first visit to Singapore the best experience. Thank you for your overwhelming kindness.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycation experience
desc: Hotel is conveniently located near the Telok Ayler MRT, close to Chinatown. Gym is great, swimming pool is small but with great view, especially night time. Buffet style breakfast is great as well. Good check in with tea and cookie served, fast check out process.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: good location
desc: Subway station is very near to the hotel, just cross the road. Most of the famous places are within 15 minutes walk distance. Even more faster you can reach to the places with subway. There are many restaurants and bars around. It was very clean. The workers were very kind and gentle. The roof top swimpool was good and with a warm pool, too. But air conditioning system is supplied with vent type, so the noise was inevitable.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing
desc: Service was second to none, even with a little mix-up at check-in. Staff were amazing. The location was amazing, and the facilities were amazing. Would definitely recommend it and come back. Generally it was amazing.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
desc: The service was excellent and the staff super friendly and efficient. The rooms were super clean with a great view from our room. Great location next to an MRT station. Would recommend the tea ceremony.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Outstanding
desc: Excellent overall experience. The quality of the room, bedding, hotel facilities & food is world class. Perhaps what impressed me most was the consistent exceptional service I experienced by all staff over the 4 days I stayed here. Darren Chen, Lobby Ambassador needs a special mention. He treated my to a traditional tea welcome explaining the culture of this amazing place. Thank you Darren, you made my stay extra special.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The impeccable stay that impresses from the moment we step into the Clan Hotel with top class cleanliness.
desc: The Clan Hotel impresses from the moment we step into its impeccably clean lobby. The attention to detail in maintaining a pristine environment is evident as we move through the spotless lift, and well-kept corridors. As we enter into our room, we met with the same level of cleanliness and care, In my quest for a great workout, i was treated to a clean gym environment adorned with spotless, well-sanitized equipment .

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Come again with pleasure
desc: Too bad there was no family room for the five of us, had to book 3 rooms. But the location of the hotel was great, everything was new and clean. The restaurant recommendations by Abdul Razzak were very good.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent location and service
desc: Very well positioned hotel for business and seeing Singapore. Within walking distance of Chinatown, Clarke Quay, and Marina Bay area - all about 10 to 15 minutes. Clean well-appointed rooms with fully equipped bathrooms. Very polite and friendly staff.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect stay in downtown Singapore
desc: A new and luxurious hotel in the middle of Chinatown. Rooms are small, but very well equipped and of the latest standards. Gym and pool provide best views over Singapore. Staff is extraordinarily friendly.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: highly recommended
desc: great staff, wonderful location, beautiful common areas...attention to detail! one of the days of my stay was my birthday, when I returned to the room I found a cake with a candle, very good! highly recommended

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, thoughtfully designed rooms
desc: We picked this hotel based on reviews saying it's in a great location, and they were so right. On arrival we quickly discovered the bars and restaurants on Pekin St and Nankin St. A bit more hunting around found some gems on Amoy St. Venturing a little further took us to the hawker markets in Lau Pa Sat and Chinatown. Getting out and about to various attractions was easy on the SMRT starting from Telok Ayer station. The room was compact but very thoughtfully designed, so everything worked really well. The view from the gym is incredible.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel
desc: Really great hotel, everything was very clean and simple, the location was perfect (surrounded by lovely bars and restaurants, and a 2min walk to Lau Pa Sat), and really easy to get a taxi to/from. Highly recommend for anyone looking a good base.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very beautiful hotel in a strategic position
desc: The hotel is very beautiful and centrally-located: 10 mins walking from Marina Bay, and 2 mins from Chinatown. In front of the hotel there is also a metro station (blue line). The hotel and the room are very well designed and clean: the room fully equipped. Amazing the pool at the last floor! The staff was very kind and helped us in everything (from the city map to the taxi service). Thank you

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best hotels in Singapore... unbeatable location!
desc: Perfect location, lovely staff and amazing facilities... the hotel is pretty new (built around 2021) and location is fantastic. We stayed around one month on a business trip, and we loved it. Next times I come back to Singapore, I will choose this hotel for sure.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Unique Hotel, top service.
desc: The moment we arrived the staff were welcoming and warm. From the quick and efficient check in to this modern yet culturally mindful style of the hotel. We appreciated the 'welcome tea ceremony and history of the area' with Darren (which could be delayed if you were too tired on check in) to the small little touches like treats in the room on arrival, soothing teas and sleep essential oil. We also appreciated the ability to freshen up in the pool amenities area and relax in this beautiful space prior to our later departure flight. Great location near MRT and great/many restaurants and bars.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel, some staff a bit indolentt
desc: Good hotel, reccomended for comfort and position. Good price afterall. Some members of the staff are very indolent and di their job so slowly‚Ä¶especially during check-in procedure‚Ä¶it s a true pity for such a good hotel

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A beautiful hotel in a great location
desc: This is the most beautiful hotel, we loved our stay! It is centrally located, and the rooms are beautifully fitted out. A highlight of our stay was the welcoming tea ceremony which was conducted by Darren Chen who is the lobby ambassador. Highly recommend this experience. Also, we found it great value for money - a very high end hotel without the cost also being too high.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: the clan review
desc: amazing stay. great staff great location and room was really nice also. really hard to fault anything from this hotel other than the gym is quite small. but nonetheless the vibe, the service and cleanliness is all amazing. really mordern but cozy at the same time.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clan Hotel
desc: Great location and hotel , very comfortable and clean . Complimentary drinks in fridge were definitely appreciated also there was complimentary welcome gift . Because we were celebrating our birthdays they bought up cake for us.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Break
desc: We stayed at The Clan for three nights. We were very impressed by the accommodation and the staff were fantastic. We were able to catch a taxi from the hotel to wherever we were going and the fares were very reasonable. Highly recommend.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Short trip to Singapore
desc: We can suggest the Clan Hotel in Singapore. Not far away from the city center and almost next to China town. The pool is small but nice on the 30th floor with a great view. Breakfast was okay with a bit slow service, but still okay

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Love this hotel.
desc: I stayed here for 3 nights. Very good service. Location is excellent. Really enjoyed staying here. Before I left this hotel, I got an great experience on tea ceremony with a tea master, Ariz. highly recommend this hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great time at The Clan!
desc: We had two rooms (connecting) and had a wonderful stay. The staff are all kind and friendly and the beds were comfy. And my family loved the bidets! :) love the architecture and decor and style. Would definitely stay here again. Very close to ‚ÄúSatay Street‚Äù for dinner

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: the best!!
desc: The experience was great, we were fascinated by this hotel and the attention we received. They were always friendly and helpful, making me feel comfortable. The food was amazing so there was no need to go to a restaurant outside the hotel to eat. Since the hotel restaurant offers a very tasty meal to the palate, not to mention the pool and the view it offers, the room is super clean, comfortable and everything is new and in good condition, everything was more than good, without a doubt a experience that I will repeat when I return to Singapore

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Anniversary stay
desc: Wonderful 6 night stay at The Clan. Check in smooth and room ready just before 2pm. Grand Premier King had amazing views, clean and everything you required it just needed a bit more drawer space, WiFi superb all over hotel. Excellent Breakfast selection but can get busy between 9 &10, we got there early then enjoyed the quiet pool & spa. Staff very friendly and helpful, MRT station nearby, along with plenty of bars, restaurants and the excellent Maxwell Hawker Centre. Overall would recommend a stay, you won't regret it.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best location
desc: Basically didn't need for breakfast as there were so many breakfast options around within walking distance - cafes, coffee shops, Hong Lim Food Centre! And the night scene too! Near so many bars and restaurants and also Chinatown point! Loved the amenities here too. Overall enjoyed my stay here, only wished my stay was longer.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Service w a heart.
desc: Just wanna say that while the Clan has delivered in terms of aesthetics & comfort, nothing beats the excellent service rendered by both Hylma & Christopher! It was indeed the icing on the cake. Being greeted by Hylma at the reception to our tea ceremony conducted by Christopher, we were blown away by their warm hospitality & knowledge of the place. Thank you for such a warm welcome and for making us "feel like part of the Clan".

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Boutique Style Modern
desc: Sophisticated ‚ÄòOnTrend‚Äô Hotel. Boutique Style. Helpful Staff. Very organised. Pool area was divine. Breakfast five star. Views of the City. Within walking distance to MRT. They will grab you a taxi within minutes.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel and great Staff Jonathan
desc: It was my second time staying here with my family. Wonderful experience stay at here. Staff Jonathan is very friendly and easy to approach. Special thanks to the hotel for free upgrade to Grand Premier room. The room was fantastic and the view was great. I would definitely come back here when I return to Singapore. Thank you and cheers!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Brilliant Hotel
desc: Hotel was amazing, room had everything you needed in a perfect location. Mike met us at the door and was wonderfully helpful and it really set the vibe for a great stay, thanks Clan Hotel and the brilliantly helpful Mike.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Singapore Holiday
desc: Spent 6 nights at The Clan. Excellent facilities, terrific room and very well located. It was easy to get in and out of the hotel, not busy and tricky to navigate your way around. Bed very comfortable. MRT very close and convenient. Staff were lovely.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Hospitality at its best
desc: The hotel is beautiful with a refined decor. I was particularly moved by the welcome card in our room, the sophisticated Tea ritual and the overall kindness of the staff. Thank you Darren for enlightening us with the tea ceremony and the history behind the ritual. We enjoyed every minute of our stay at the Clan Hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel I have ever stayed at!
desc: Best hotel I have ever stayed at. Spacious room, friendly staff, lots of service and what a great pool! You never think about how a great shower can start your day perfectly, right? Well, we thought about it here :-) We stayed at MBS the day after, so maybe it is not the best ever ever. But it is the second best ever by far. Would come back anytime!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A great room on the smaller side
desc: The hotel is wonderful. A calm aura all around in terms of look, smells and sounds. The rooms have everything you need and with great views and a lot of light. Though here as with many newer hotels the rooms are on the smaller side, but not problematically small just minimalistic.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan experience
desc: Darren held a beautiful tea ceremony. The hotel is very clean, friendly staff, beautiful interior, the jacuzzi and swimming pool on 33rd floor is a must as night and day time, as its included in price, gym too, the breakfast buffet didnt have much option and the food was a bit naff otherthan breakfast, perfect location - central to everything, use the grap app to book cheaper taxis, there's a strip of food downstairs, feels safe, overall nice experience

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Top location at a perfect place
desc: We were very satisfied with everything at this hotel. Directly beside a metro station, easy way to the airport, but a lot of singapur highlights you will reach by just walking. Super breakfast! Perfect relaxing beds..

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank you Jonathan!
desc: It is my first time staying here. location is very good with a lots of restaurant nearby. Special thanks to Jonathan for his great service. The room he arrange is very spacious, and the view is really breathtaking. Super recommend this hotel and i will definitely be back again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay
desc: We just had an amazing 3 night stay at the clan hotel. The rooms are very clean and the staff are very helpful. We had a brilliant tea ceremony with Darren who explained everything and gave us some gifts to take home! We are on our honeymoon and the staff decorated our room and gave us complimentary dessert and chocolates. Definitely check out the pool and gym. Overall, a fantastic stay.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect hotel in Singapore
desc: The location was spot on, we were a walk away from the marina and close to China Town! Plenty of restaurants and bars, perfect hotel for those that want to see and do everything Singapore has to offer. The service was 10/10, the room was spotless and aircon was great. Could not fault this hotel, I 100% recommend!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Location!
desc: Comfortable and great location! The hotel rooms were large enough and we had a great view (we were on Floor 14). The location of the hotel is amazing. It is right next to the MTR and nearby China Town. Close to amazing restaurants and bars. Really nice rooftop pool and Jacuzzi as well.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful Hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel very nice location close to most attractions . New building and very modern furnishing. The bed was very comfortable. Pool and gym were very nice small and cosy not crowded at all. The service and staff have been spectacular. Very helpful and respectful staff. Would love to stay there again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Hotel Singapore.
desc: Excellent hotel, centrally located, easy walking to China town and Clarke Quay. Marina Bay Sands is also close enough to walk to. The Bar was the perfect place to have a refreshing drink after a day of sightseeing.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A weekend in Singapore
desc: The room was delightful and the bed so comfortable. The hotel is modern, clean and the staff very friendly and helpful. It is centrally located near Boat Quay opposite a metro station which is great for sightseeing. The infinity pool on the top floor offers great views. Perfect.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great!
desc: Well located and helpful, friendly staff in a very nice hotel. Comfortable beds in lovely clean rooms. The boys at Concierge always prompt and helpful and smiling. Rooftop pool was well equipped with towels and very relaxing. The let down for me was breakfast which was average for $30. Had a very pleasant stay.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location and experience
desc: Very beautiful hotel. Luxury feeling and the welcome tea is a nice extra. The swimming pool on top very good for a refreshing swim, but not enough beds because there is no space. Breakfast not very excited about. Very expensive and expected a little more. Better go to the Genius restaurant right behind the hotel, and you get 20% discount if you are staying in the Clan Hotel. Overal good stay, good location and friendly staff.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Hotel
desc: Great hotel for the price!! Friendly staff, clean, and an amazing location. The breakfasts were well priced and the food was all very lovely and fresh. The staff have great knowledge of the local hawker food and restaurants.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location and relaxing hotel.
desc: Had a very relaxing break. Great location near train. Really enjoyed gym, with video classes. Pool is stunning with beautiful views of the city. We used in the evening, as a relaxing end to the day. Ccc

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Janice
desc: The concierge at the front of the hotel were very helpful ringing taxis and general information for our trip especially Nazmi. The staff at the restaurants were helpful with the menus and the lobby staff made checking in and out very easy.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Family Trip to Singapore
desc: Very nice hotel, consider to book a bigger sized roomüòâ No need to go for breakfast or dinner at the hotel if you like hawker centers (300m away). The pool is open until midnight! Overall, ideally located close to Chinatown etc

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful hotel with wonderful staff
desc: Really enjoyed my stay at The Clan Hotel. It‚Äôs an absolutely beautiful hotel. Not only is it immaculate but there is a real attention to detail here, the staff are incredibly helpful and there is lovely selection of teas. I was assisted on my check in by Hylma Tay who was so helpful and kind! She also left me a selection of teas in the room which I am very much enjoying back in London. I had a great experience from start to finish and will be returning each time I go to Singapore!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, cleanliness was spot-on
desc: Excellent location with easy access to Chinatown and the MBS area. The room was beautiful with a splendid view of the Chinatown area. It was nice seeing the occasional cars at nighttime amongst the streetlights and the night sky. Very clean and we also appreciated that the toothbrushes provided were of different colours. Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Pool was nice but we didn‚Äôt get to enjoy too much of it as there were quite a number of people up there. Overall a lovely experience and would definitely recommend to family and friends.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very pleasant and uplifting experience but beware of hidden charges
desc: The experience was a great one with the staff going out of the way to make you feel welcomed. But the extra hidden 10% room charge on top of 10% service charge left a bitter taste. But overall will still recommend
