hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: very good
desc: nice and cozy. good location. people service is friendly and a good view at the cafe so can see through the city view so you can have a good dine in experience. Will come back next trip for leasure or in business trip.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good stayca
desc: Staycation (considering it‚Äôs still COVID situation). Pleasantly surprised at the superb service and very nice room (especially with the great view). The infinity pool (decently small) but provides a good view high up at 30 stories high.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A memorable staycation
desc: It is my 2nd stay with the clan, the check-in was really quick, the staff is helpful. Will be back again for sure. excellence service, Juvena has been very helpful thru out the stay. I love the view of the grand premier room, the view is amazing! Thanks for the hospitality, stay safe everyone! see you again in real soon!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great location, clean rooms
desc: Highly recommended for both business stay or family with young children. Train station is just next to the hotel. Many nice places to eat near the hotel. Lao pa sat, chinatown, satay street are stone throw away.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: By far the most hospitable hotel in Singapore
desc: We had the best stay here with the most accommodating and friendly staff. The rooms were equipped with Chromecast so they're perfect for binge-watching a show during your staycay. The food was great too! There's nothing not to love about The Clan and we're surely going back again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Staycay in SG
desc: Where do I begin‚Ä¶.This hotel is just perfect! We booked a 2-nights stay for a birthday celebration and we weren‚Äôt disappointed. As this is quite a new hotel, we weren‚Äôt really sure what to expect but we were pleasantly surprised. The room is spacious with lovely views of the city. Location-wise, it is opposite Telok Ayer mrt. There are many restaurants and bars around so you‚Äôll be well-fed. There‚Äôs also an infinity pool and a large gym. I recommend at least a 2 nights‚Äô stay to ensure you get to use all the facilities due to the covid-19 measures in place. The breakfast was delicious and there wasn‚Äôt a long waiting time. The service was impeccable. The hotel provided a turn-down service and allowed us to pick our welcome refreshments. In general, the staff were cheerful and we

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Home Away from Home
desc: This has been our 3rd time staycation in the hotel (stayed last April and May), and the experience has been consistently excellent. The hotel feels and smells brand new, and the rooms have been really a sanctuary for staying in. The location is also very convenient, both for transportation and food options. The Clan Keepers have all been exceptional, and they really provide a warm welcome for first timers, as well as to returning guests. The breakfast options are also great, especially with the rotating chef‚Äôs specials.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience at The Clan!
desc: Very service oriented staff (Nurul and Sam) in making our stay as comfortable as possible. Had a great stay in the hotel. Nice gym and pool with breathtaking view on the 30th floor. Strongly recommend to anyone who wants to have a hotel stay with strong service experience!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service with very clean room.
desc: All the service staff we encountered were excellent. We were also given a surprise birthday cake. Have to highlight the cleanliness in the room. This has to be the cleanest hotel room we ever stayed. Wet tissue stayed clean after our attempt to wipe the table surface.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Stay
desc: It was our best stay so far. I was closed by the 'gong' on the entrance. Staff are well trained and attention to details. We had the best sleep because of the U shape pillow. View as awesome. Unfortunate that we could not have the Welcome Tea ceremony due to the pandemic. Location was very good.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience! Worthy of 5-star hotel despite small room size
desc: Service was top-notch. The tea offered was excellent. Gym and pool facilties are must-use. Location is great too with many food options within walking distance. Only downside was the soft pillows which gave me an ache on both nights of sleep.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing service, new hotel, great location
desc: My hubby and I brought our two kids (6- and 2- year old) for a two-night staycation. The room, pool, gym, Chi restaurant definitely met our expectations for a brand new hotel - everything was beautifully designed and we loved the convenience of the range of restaurants downstairs. What exceeded our expectation was the service of The Clan's crew - everyone we met were friendly and professional. Joyce Agustin left a lasting impression on us (especially the kids) - she was knowledgeable on the walking tour, surprised us with a birthday cake and was always brightening up our day with her smile and conversations.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation with a little celebration
desc: Have my honeymoon staycation with my wife and the services was top notch from The Clan team. Staff was friendly, place is clean. Highly recommended to visit for work and play. Location wise was at the heart of Singapore. Everything else is nearby within reach.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Impressive
desc: New and clean. Very pleased with the stay here for our 2 nights. Breakfast is amazing too and very filling with good varieties. I wish I can stay again! Swimming pool is nice and gym is of adequate size.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing staycation
desc: The hotel itself is in a very convenient location. Good food and great bars are just around the corner. Easily walkable to the river for sightseeing and having a few drinks. Great view of the city from the gym or the pool ! Absolutely loved the design and decors in the hotel. The hotel staffs are professional and polite, one of the best I've had in a long time. They are friendly and approachable, making us feel very welcomed at all times. One staff in particular that stood out was Mr Samuel Lee. It's not easy standing out in such a high performing team, well done. Will definitely be back soon. Thanks !

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel
desc: The staff was very friendly and approachable. The room was also very clean. The hotel also allowed us to have late check out timing. The check in and check out was very smooth and quick and I was very satisfied with the stay.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The CLAN Experience.
desc: Recently stayed for 2 nights. Very nice & restful. Overall ambience of the hotel is very good. Highly recommended. The breakfast served and the restaurant served in was good. Service was excellent. The pool was a fantastic experience, especially in the evenings.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A Staycay As Good As A Getaway
desc: I have to say that this modern young hotel yet with a rich essence of our culture, I will return. An amazing team from my arrival at level 1, to my check in at level 2 and all the way up. Wonderful team and they should be appreciated. Kenneth Ong has been taking care of me from my arrival till my 2nd night. I feel he is a gem. Best wishes to all and I heart Kenneth. Thank you!!! XX

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service; modern design; conveniently located
desc: Service was exceptional, checked us in bright and early to avoid delay in the afternoon, which was very much appreciated. Design of the rooms and throughout the property was stunning and thoughtful. Breakfast adequate, not exceptional. Pool view at sunset hour was amazing. Slight knock would be a couple of calls to the front desk went unanswered. I‚Äôm willing to assume that they were busy and overwhelmed as the service was otherwise consistently polite and welcoming. Would recommend!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Cosy stay indulged with some pampering
desc: Enjoyed the stay, staff were courteous and helpful, forthcoming as well. Room is decently spacious and quite nicely decorated, the lobby looks impressive though - classy, encompasses richness of culture. I particularly like the rooftop pool and the gym with a panoramic view, the spacious and well equipped gym didn't give the claustrophobic feel, which was very appreciated.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good service, comfy room
desc: Visited here last year on staycay. The room was clean and comfy, and the free breakfast was pretty decent. I got in touch with them even after a year to get some help and their service went above and beyond to assist me. Good job guys keep it up!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A hotel worth staying
desc: Stayed for 2 nights. Excellent service rendered by Sam from Front Desk throughout my stay. I was impressed that he could remembered our conversation during my check in and asked about it during my check out. Kudos to the housekeeper who takes time to check if u need anything when she was making her round in the afternoon though housekeeping had been done in the day. Breakfast was good which includes a daily special and the chinese staff who had served us both mornings were attentive and observant. The stay was made more memorable by the staffs with their excellence service. Not forgetting the sales team who was quick to respond to my enquiries during the booking as well as prior to my stay. Thank you very much.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect little staycation
desc: This is a repeat trip to The Clan because I enjoyed the first stay very much. The service was impeccable from the start. The room, while not the biggest, was very comfortable and clean. The location is excellent as well, with Chinatown and Telok Pagar, within walking distance and restaurants of all kinds just a stone's throw away.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at the Clan hotel
desc: The hotel is relatively new and clean, the staffs are friendly and booking of the facilities are done with relative ease during check in. There was a surprise cake for our anniversary from the hotel. we also join the complimentary tour along the amoy street to know about the history of the area. The pools at level 30 have a great view too. Overall is a enjoyable stay

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycaytion at The Clan Hotel
desc: The room was cozy and well designed. I love the atmosphere, it feels like you are entering a space full of historic & traditions . The view was maginificent especially the view from my room and sky pool. Location of the hotel is strategic, in between Raffles Place, Telok Ayer and Chinatown. The lobby was classy and the staff were friendly and helpful to assist.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Hotel
desc: The Clan Hotel a top hotel with very attentive to details. Was very impress from the moment we check in till we check out after a 3 days 2 nights stay there for our honeymoon. The room is in tip top condition, clean and impressive. the view is great and the attentive to cleanliness is what impress me the most.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stayca
desc: Prior to check in, I email the front office about what is needed and if there‚Äôs complimentary carpark, they replied very quickly. I enjoyed the stayca experience, staff were friendly and when I told Vanessa during check it‚Äôs for my friend‚Äôs bd, she arranged a cake for him! Fantastic!!!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent customer service.
desc: We were warmly welcomed at the hotel. The layout of the hotel makes the check in process exclusive and you‚Äôll definitely feel special. Stay was fantastic. No much complaints too! One thing that future guests should do will probably be choosing the Grand Premier rooms with bathtubs. That would have made the stay much more enjoyable. Hotel is also located in central region, lots to explore.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Top notch luxury with a warm touch
desc: I never write reviews, but after our 2nd stay at The Clan, I just have to give them some love. First off- the hotel is beautiful. Its modern x traditional design is tastefully done, very classy. Room cleanliness is impeccable, and they take care of every detail providing things you never knew you were missing in life- like a tea set & heated toilet seat! If you ever get to stay there I would highly recommend going for a nighttime warm jacuzzi soak alternating with the regular lap pool on the rooftop. Beautiful & peaceful experience. Most importantly, The Clan's motto is to 'take care of you like you are our own' and we have stayed at many hotels but never felt such warm & efficient service- the staff are all amazing, ever-patient, very prompt & accommodating while always

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: My partner and I went there for my birthday and it was an extremely pleasant and fuss-free experience. I‚Äôm particular about room cleanliness, so I was delighted to find every surface I checked properly dusted and cleaned. Due to the 2HA restrictions, we had to have food delivered and they sent it up to our room instead self collection at the lobby. The pillow options were also satisfactory, having chronic neck and back pain finding good hotel pillows were rare. Lastly, they went the extra mile and surprised me with cake and a handwritten note. We would definitely return again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful birthday stay at The Clan
desc: We enjoyed our stay very much. We were upgraded to a delux room because it was my birthday. And the hotel even gave us a surprise birthday cake. Loved our stay very much and we will definitely want to return again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at Clan Hotel
desc: Staycation, a short getaway! :) the room was spacious and roomy. Experience at swimming pool was relaxing! The breakfast was yummy and generous! Service is good and responsive with a smile! We will visit again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Stay @ The Clan
desc: Celebrated our Anniversary at The Clan. Customer service was beyond our expectation. We had an upgrade to the Premier Deluxe King Room. It was superb! Clean, Cozy vibe. Everything was just perfect. Would definitely return to The Clan again some day.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: first staycay experience
desc: the hotel has very strong theme and concept, they stay true to their design idea. strong heritage and very supportive towards the local designer and business (in traditional and art form) the toilet are one of the best experience. very clean and high tech toilet. staff were very kind and always ready to serve people. their uniform are designed specifically towards individual's character/personality. the lobby/lift area has oolong tea smell, very local/chinese which runs in the concept.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel experience!
desc: All the staffs were amazing from the check-in process all the way to the check-out process. Although there were issues with my hotel card (could not access to the room floor in the lift). They render the issue in a professional way and even compliment us with a late check-out time. The staffs there really brings the customer experience to a whole new level! The room we stayed at were amazing!! Great view and clean room. Definitely spacious and the bed was comfortable. Although the value could be pricey, but it‚Äôs worth the experience.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: No regrets!
desc: Had been looking at many hotels as a staycation choice and finally decided to give The Clan a try since it is new. Was not disappointed as the service of the staff was great and one can see that they take pride in service standards. The complimentary breakfasts were also beyond expectations. Very happy to have made this choice and had a wonderful 4-night stay. The location is also good for the variety of restaurants around and accessibility to many popular destinations, for both a tourist and a local.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Hotel
desc: I had a wonderful experience at The Clan Hotel, I went for my fiancee birthday staycation for 3 days 2 nights, I take Premier Room and get a higher floor and corner room with amazing city views. The rooms were clean and the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in. The rooftop Sky Pool was beautiful at night and we had an amazing time. The breakfast was superb and the tea in the room the most I love it, I can't remember how many time I drink the tea those 3 days. Every staff member I encountered, from the concierge to the check- in to the cleaning staff were fantastic. Great attitude. Helpful, and always available. They went over and beyond to help make our stay enjoyable. I and my fiancee were impressed the moment we step down from grab, We were greeted with friendly a staff

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic and Luxurious experience
desc: We booked with the corporate promotion, book 1 night + 1 night free stay. To our surprise, we were given complimentary breakfast for both mornings, alongside a free upgrade to Premier room upon check in. Pros: - The room has breathtaking views of the city - Service was excellent! There's a very nice Jasmine scent in the lobby - Rooms are well furnished, equipped with UV sanitizer, fresh filtered water, smart TV and comfortable bed - Breakfast food was excellent -> especially Qin breakfast - Convenient and accessible location Cons: - Pool is rather small, deeper at 1.2m so not ideal for young children - Card reader in the lift is not very sensitive -> requires card to be placed completely flat and flushed to the sensor whilst simultaneously selecting the floor Unfortunate: -

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Impressive Staycation Experience :)
desc: Upgraded my room to the GRAND PREMIER ROOM. Stayed for 2 nights. Welcomed at the 1st floor by a very friendly concierge lady, directed to 2nd floor lobby area for check in. The progress is very efficient and profession. Check in done within 5 mins by the male reception. Had my room tour with Nurul which are very fun and interesting. She is being superb helpful and kind. She explained very well regarding of the item and amenities of room, and help us to arrange the breakfast, servicing of room, pool reservation and amenities top up to ensure we do really relax well during our staycation here. Appreciate the housekeeping runner lady and guy who often assist to send me replacement towel and bath room amenities. Our room is fantastic and WOW which almost caused me don't want to

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing experience
desc: Worth it with the 1 for 1 nights stay at the clan hotel with complimentary breakfast ( both days) and parking. For 2 nights it was $110+ if not for the complimentary parking. We got upgraded to the premium room at a high floor and was given a room tour by a friendly staff, Kenneth. Nice pool and view was fantastic at the evening sunset. Did not managed to use the gym as was closed due to latest covid measures. Breakfast was in-room as well due to covid measure at that time ( no dining in). Lots of cheap and nice food nearby even though it is in the CBD area. Located just beside Telok Ayer MRT, very convenient .

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Family getaway in mist of Covid
desc: Clean and nice hotel. Room is a bit small for family of 3. Easily assessible via MRT. Plenty of hawker food located within walking distance. Will be good if there are some organized activities for the guests to take part in (probably when Covid is better)

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Heritage location
desc: The hotel was situated at one of the most culturally rich districts of Singapore. Hotel room was fabulous, great sunset view, infinity pool was out of the world. Not huge, but enough for a family to enjoy a good swim and dip! The view from the pool is spectacular! Gym seems very well equipped but due to covid restrictions, not open.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Luxurious and comfortable
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed the trip and the overall experience at The Clan was more than satisfactory. Their service were top notch. Kenneth assisted us in our check in and he was warm and helpful. The deluxe room that we had booked were smaller than expected but still had everything that we needed. The heated toilet seat was definitely a pleasant surprise! We were also given a complimentary anniversary cake that was accompanied with a handwritten scroll. Talk about a personal touch! The TV in the room was big and came with chromecast so we were able to cast netflix or Spotify. This came in handy as the TV was sadly not equipped with our favourite movie channels. There were also no Chinese movie channels which were ironic seeing that they are a Chinese styled hotel. But other than

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Family staycation
desc: First class service throughout my stay and from all the staff I interacted with. Thank you for the very warm hospitality and going the extra mile for the limousine arrangement and the Discover Hokkien experience. Truly felt like home and one of the clan.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing staycation. Applaud and commendation to Vyan and Wan Hui Shie
desc: I made a proposal to my long time girlfriend and i do not think i could have done it without Vyan. Vyan was exceptionally helpful in preparation and took the intiative to help me along with minute tasks without hesitation. Such dedication and simple gesture to me and my girlfriends big day could not have been a better help. Till now i am still extremely grateful to vyan's efforts Wan hui Shie, is the next MVP that i truly applaud. Her thoughtfulness to make my stay enjoyable was especially sweet and commendable. She continuously assisted my stay and ensured my time in clan hotel was more than enjoyable, the extend in which i belive was superb. Her warmth and friendliness, without a doubt, truly represents the Clan hotel, as a whole. Although Clan hotel may be new, but i belive

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Beautiful stay in the heart of the city
desc: In the heart of the city, it felt strange to feel slowed down when we entered The Clan. It provided both my friend and myself a space of rest and relaxation. Staying true to a Chinese hospitality - the welcome tea was particularly enjoyable where the tea master is attentive towards us, ensuring our tea cups constantly refilled. We definitely felt attended to, with the space and privacy we enjoy too.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The lovely and heartwarming experience with The Clan Hotel
desc: Our stay here is not what a usual staycation entails; The Clan Hotel provided us an extraordinary experience. All staffs in the hotel are genuine and they never fail to ensure in providing you the best service throughout our stay. As this stay was meant to be a birthday and proposal surprise for fiance, with that, I can never thank Sam & Joyce enough for their relentless support and effort in making my wedding proposal successful. With Sam's 9 years in experience in this sector, he took the extra mile to travel to another hotel in Sentosa within this short time frame to source the ribbons needed for the balloons. Additionally, Sam had also personally complimented us with a bottle of red wine and extended our check out time. Thank you everyone for this wonderful experience on

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant stay but cold pool
desc: Entrance of hotel and lobby was pretty cool, gave off abit of those Kingsmen vibe. Welcome tea was delicious too! The Nanyang Ritual tea and Ritual tea (both specially blend for the hotel) were both fragrant and light, can buy them back if you like. For the room, I like the sitting area. Can simply just chill, drink tea and view the city. Loved the bidet toilet bowl and the seat was always warmed up. I like that there's a filter drinking water tap too. Pool and Gym looked inviting and overlooking the city, but my husband and I only went to the pool. Water was very cold despite the sun shining in, would be great if the pool is heated. Breakfast was limited, only 5 or 6 items on the menu but very filling and nice. We had the Qin breakfast and the daily special (I believe was

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel in great location!
desc: Booked a birthday staycay for my girlfriend. Check-in and Check-out was fuss free. Also staff were attentive and helpful. asked them to help me warm up some food that was bought before check-in as we were hungry and they greatfully assisted us. Would love to come back again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Room with a View for Staycay
desc: Staff was truly great and friendly. Appreciate them for accommodating to my request for Grand Premier Room (with top up) and late checkout. Do note that welcome tea ceremony is however ceased till further notice due to covid.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Cant wait to stay again!
desc: It was one of the greatest weekend stay! During this period, when we are not able to travel abroad, The Clan hotel stay made it felt like we are overseas due to the hospitality and location of the hotel! Hope to be back soon and stay at the premier room, we love the view so much!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable hotel with a good location
desc: We enjoyed our stay at The Clan. The premier room was comfortable and spacious - more than enough space for 2 people. Having the Master Series add-ons like the aromatherapy oils and the handmade soaps certainly made the stay more pleasant. Huge bed that's very comfortable, and great view of the city especially if you can get a corner room. Toilet is nice with a heated toilet bowl and bidet (can get noisy at night with its regular self-cleaning so make sure you close the toilet door when you sleep), as well as a non-fog mirror. Only issue with the room we had was the air-con going into half-power one night and us having to wake at 3am in the morning to turn the air con back on to full power. Pool is lovely too.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at The Clan
desc: Superb location with amenities all around. The bathroom amenities were top notch and was even offered a selection of special scented bar soap. Breakfast selection was sufficient and tasted good, can tell that items were made to order. Overall, very happy with the stay there and would recommend to anyone.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous staycation!
desc: Thoroughly enjoyed my 3D2N staycation at The Clan. The room conveniently had everything you could possibly need and was very comfortable. Loved the spacious bathroom with high-tech features. In-room dining service was great - highly recommend the Curryage and Thunderbolt Roti Prata. Breakfast at the Qin restaurant exceeded my expectations. I would love to come back for another relaxing staycation!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best staycation yet - a very memorable stay
desc: I've been on more than 10+ staycations since Covid lockdown started. I don't usually write reviews after my stay (this is probably the first in many, many years) but I thought The Clan deserved one. I originally booked a Deluxe room for a 3D2N solo birthday celebration, but I decided to bump up to a Grand Premiere room upon checking in (this rate isn't published or available on the site, you probably have to write in to them to check on availability). The room is decent size, spacious and perfect for solo or couple getaways. I was on the 27th floor and the view was so, so pretty. It's probably one of the best staycation views I gotten (something Fullerton or Capitol Kempinski can't offer). Breakfast was great (their chef daily special was awesome!), pool was nice but what

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional Birthday Celebration
desc: Chose to stay at the Clan as a "holiday getaway" and birthday treat to myself and it certainly did not disappoint. My hotel gave me a glimpse of my staycation even before my stay by allowing me to choose my in room refreshments?! This is something i have never experienced before and it made me look forward to my stay even more! The interiors of the hotel are tastefully decorated in the theme of black (classy and mysterious almost), accompanied with high ceilings strategically furnished with ornaments which fits into the theme like a puzzle piece. The ambience was uplifting and the whole place was certainly a state of the art. However, the most commendable chapter during my stay here was my experience with the staff. Everyone that I came across were splendid! Casual chatters

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice, Clean, Good Service.
desc: Overall a very pleasant experience. The room was very nicely furnished and clean. Air conditioning was superb. Bathroom was clean and included a bidet! TV was huge and there was a chrome cast available for streaming from my phone/laptop. Room was sound proof too so we can enjoy the movies at great volume and peace of mind. Service was good. Fantastic hotel overall!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Experience
desc: It was indeed an amazing experience staying at The Clan Hotel. Location was great. Many nice restaurants around it. The staffs were friendly, attentive. Food was fantastic. Was really impressed with the spread. It was awesome and generous.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best
desc: The short stay was one to remember. The hotel is situated in an extremely convenient location with Telok Ayer MRT station just a stone throw away and plenty of restaurants nearby. The view from the hotel room was also quite spectacular as you get a unique landscape of shophouses mixed in with the high-rises in the CBD. That said, what made this experience was the impeccable service provided by the wonderful guest relations team from the Clan Hotel. The attention to details and initiative displayed to ensure that we enjoyed our short stay there was extremely memorable. It left us wanting more! My friend and I were incredibly impressed and we will back hopefully sooner than later. We would like to also specially thank Kenneth for being so wonderful and accommodating. You have

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant staycation
desc: Having spent my birthday over a staycation at The Clan Hotel, I had a wonderful experience and was really amazed by the services from arrival to having briefed on room introductions. The location was not too far off from many popular areas for shopping and cafe/restaurant hopping. It would definitely make a fine consideration for 1 of the many hotels of our choices in future.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome Return stay
desc: one of the best boutique hotel so far I have stayed, no regrets for returning stay as the staffs really put in a lot effort in making the guest warm. Quiet and peaceful as you stepped into the hotel and the rooms. Loved the food at QIN, gym and pool, very personnel as what I can say. Will sure be back for my 3rd stay, and to all the staffs at The Clan, thank you and stay safe during these time.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service
desc: Friendly staff. Good reception, smooth check in (I checked in way earlier than check in time ;) ) Clean room and great view if you are on the high floor and in a corner room of a Premier room. Comfortable bed. The welcome tea is nice. Delicious breakfast and dinner. Although a bit salty for me, overall is still yummy. Food is not cheap either. Location is good.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent service and hospitality
desc: The staffs were amazing and welcoming. Very nice and attention to details. The hotel is great and the room is in excellent condition! Great city view too. It was an enjoyable staycation for us. Thanks

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Worth your money and more!
desc: My initial experience walking into the hotel was, "Wow! This place is classy!" and I continued to be impressed throughout our 2 day stay here. The room was clean and elegant, and we enjoyed the complimentary drinks and snacks provided. Room service and turn down service came by often, which is a plus. The toilets come with a bidet too! The hotel's restaurant, QIN, also served food that we thoroughly enjoyed. We used the pool as well, which was slightly small but it had a great view and was good to relax in. Finally, I have to really compliment the staff for truly making our stay enjoyable. Everyone was really friendly, easy to talk to and was willing to help whenever they could. I'll definitely be coming back for another visit. Thank you!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycation for a wearied soul
desc: I booked a 3D2N staycation with Clan Hotel to unwind and celebrate a work milestone. What really impressed me was the staff's friendliness and attention to detail - we had conversed briefly upon check in and they remembered/ cared about my reason for stay (work anniversary) enough to send up a cake in the evening as part of the celebration. Given it was a weekday stay, I had access to the pool at least once a day since there was slightly lower occupancy rate, and in line with SG's social distancing measures. The staff had also allowed me to extend my check out timing given I had requested t participate in the telok ayer/ chinatown walk on the day of my departure. They did not have to accede to these requests, but the staff were very nice to accommodate and for that, they

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay
desc: Classy place with historical slany. Great location near Chinatown. Really enjoyed the welcoming ceremony with tea and cookies. Modern equipment and TV. Nice decor and good and pool facilities. Helpful staff.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay - My #1 recommendation for hotel in CBD
desc: Absolutely FANTASTIC stay. First of all, the service was impeccable from start to end. Everyone was very hospitable even when we had to call the reception late at night to request for stuff. Their response was quick as well even when we needed an engineer in our room to fix the chilly aircon at 10+ pm. They were also attentive to our needs. The breakfast was filling and delicious the room was clean and new I seriously have nothing bad to say about the staycay. The tea ceremony was a unique touch the hotel is beautiful I LOVE the smell of the hotel. Definitely my #1 recommendation to my friends in CBD and at the price I paid? Oh it is so worth it. (4 stars for sleep quality and rooms because the room was a bit chilly, not sure if it's due to the rainy weather. But anw they did

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycayy ever in Singapore!
desc: Had been experiencing a few different local hotels before, I would say @theclanhotel is the best hotel! The concept of The Clan, the peoples, the great & extra mile service they provided. hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing hotel for staycation
desc: If you have the chance, definitely get the Grand Premier Room which comes with the Clan Keeper service and of course, a bigger room. Our Clan Keeper (Wan) was super nice to help us prepare a bath even though it was outside of the timing. Service quality overall was fantastic! The front desk team was very efficient in replying any questions I had pre-arrival, and Farah who had helped to facilitate my check-in was of great help throughout my stay. PRO TIP: Get the U-shaped body pillow from their pillow menu. Hands down, best pillow I've ever slept on in my life.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Family staycation
desc: We felt the warmth welcome, service is superb and amazing, staff are very friendly and accommodating. excellent food and big serving, clean room and public areas, enjoyed the pool and guestroom amenities, complimentary,...though i find it not so kid friendly and handicap friendly, no ramps.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Service as good as the views!
desc: Service staff were always polite and attentive. Check-in and check-out procedures were smooth and flawless. Views from the room were amazing. Breakfast was scrumptious and extremely filling, and the menu also carried a nice range of items.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 10/10 service, location and comfort
desc: So upon check-in, we were served by Kenneth Ong. While we were waiting to be brought up to our room, there was a tea ceremony that my partner and I thoroughly enjoyed (it's only for fully vaccinated people though, understandably). Following that, Kenneth brought us to our room and gave us our room tour. He was very meticulous, welcoming and his service was 100/10! He even took care of small details such as ringing the doorbell and knocking the door before letting us enter, which for me personally, was him displaying a great attention to detail since it's the seventh lunar month now. His room tour was elaborate and he really went above and beyond for us. We really appreciated the warm welcome from him which helped make our entire stay feel really pleasant as well. We booked the

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clan Hotel is great
desc: Clan Hotel is at a very good location in the CBD area. It is nostalgic. Very good food in the surrounding area. Staff at Clan Hotel are polite, well trained and very welcoming. The room is clean and modern bathroom facility.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Totally beyond expectations
desc: Will keep you in suspense of what‚Äôs available - the hospitality provided is first class! The staff are very pleasant and the location is close to the CBD yet right in the middle of a clan of eateries, pubs, heritage buildings etc.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing
desc: The Clan checked all the boxes for us! The room alone was already spectacular - the view, the cleanliness! Especially loved the bathroom as it had a heated toilet seat and bidet features. Service was great, upon checking in, they had a welcome tea ceremony for us. We also had daily turndown service and a surprise cake was brought into our room on my birthday while we were out for the day. Facilities wise, their gym had a smith machine, trampoline, and spin bikes that faced a TV where you could enjoy a follow-along spin workout (among other things). The food was surprisingly good as well, I really loved the Kaya toast and seafood laksa from their breakfast menu, and the butternut soup and beef rendang from their all-day menu. Would definitely stay again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic staff - A wonderful way to Relax and Unwind
desc: We recently did a Staycation at Clan; a wonderful experience! The entire experience was well thought out with a set of fantastic staff ensuing a comfortable stay; right from alighting at the drop-off point (with the service staff opening the cab doors), to checking in and finally reaching our room, there was always someone on hand to ensure that you don't get lost. Vyan showed us the room and also walked us through the room, as well as the hygiene measures taken by the hotel. As part of the room, we were able to secure a clan keeper to set up the bath for us, and Sam was perfect in helping us get that set up. For foodies, the hotel is perfectly situated in the heart the city, with access to Lau Pa Sat (Satay club at night), many restaurants along Telok Ayer, and for those

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb! Stay here and you won‚Äôt regret it!
desc: I had a really enjoyable staycation here with girlfriends from Friday thru to Sunday. Every aspect of the experience was tip-top! Staff and service was excellent - very attentive, kind and authentic. Breakfast was superb, a fabulous spread with great service. The room is beautifully appointed, bed is exceedingly comfortable and amenities are top-notch. The location of the hotel is very good - with an inexhaustible range of restaurants at its doorstep. It was great exploring the neighbourhood, Chinatown, Clarke Quay and Boat Quay too. It also served as a great launching point for a Sunday morning bike ride through the Marina Bay area, GBB, the Marina Barrage and to the East Coast Park. Gym and pool are really nice and empty in the early morning. Altogether, we had a fabulous

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome birthday celebration at The Clan hotel
desc: I had an awesome birthday staycation at The Clan hotel with my husband. The lobby has a nice tea scent and the hotel was tastefully designed. The staff at the hotel was friendly and attentive to our needs. It was a great coincidence that Kenneth Ong (Guest Service Executive) who helped us with our check-in, has the same birthday as me! He paid great attention to details and has constantly checked in with us if there is anything we need. Service here is AWESOME! The cocktails and The Clan beer at the Qin restaurant were unique and refreshing. Also, the ondeh ondeh cake that was delivered to our room, coupled with their in-house The Ritual tea was delightful. I bought some The Ritual tea back to share with my family! Highly recommend to stay at this hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly Recommended
desc: Love it's modern lux vibes, very classy. The hotel is very well designed. Enjoyed the great views of the Telok Ayer and Chinatown heritage districts against the city backdrop from the room, swimming pool and the pool. Very impressed with this hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Staycay Ever?!
desc: This is easily the best staycay hotels I have ever been to apart from Mandarin Oriental, Parkroyal Pickering and a few others. Kenneth/Kenny was an excellent staff member who made my check-in experience very smooth, quick and enjoyable with his professionalism and friendliness. Our room was top-tier quality, I truly enjoyed the room layout, as well as the big and soft bed and pillows and also the warm toilet seat!! Got me sold right there hahaha. Altho I wish the TV had a Netflix option so we can watch our own shows but its alright! Complementary in-room refreshments were very good! Loved the cookies. The pool had a nice view from the 30th floor and the water is slightly cold but that is alright! I enjoyed my swimming pool experience! Checking in and out was a breeze too as

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Like One of Their Own
desc: After experiencing an unpleasant stay in The Barracks Hotel (lacklustre and cold service) a few weeks ago, I decided to give The Clan Hotel (another property under Far East Hospitality) a try. I was exceptionally amazed by the warm hospitality provided by The Clan Hotel! While the room may be relatively smaller than other nearby hotels, its design and layout were modern and sleek. As I required a replacement for the kettle in the room, the service provided by the staff was prompt! Every staff takes pride in executing their duty with a smile. Really appreciate the welcome tea ceremony and souvenirs provided in the room. The breakfast in QIN was of great quality too! In all, The Clan Hotel indeed made me feel like I was one of them!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Cosy weekend at The Clan
desc: I chose to stay here because of its exquisite design and ideal location for a birthday staycation. The hotel is also a new kid in the block (6 months), therefore everything was relatively new and clean. Everything from check-in to the welcome tea ceremony was perfectly designed. As a tea lover, I really loved their house teas - The Ritual and English Breakfast are definitely personal favourites now! Room is a perfect size for two. View was facing Chinatown, afternoon sun, but nothing the black out curtains can't do to block out the heat, if that is a concern. View was fabulous too at the 22nd level. Location wise - everything is pretty accessible. Food is located in almost every direction even on Sundays! If you drive, car park is available at Far East Square with reasonable

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent Stay in Clan Hotel
desc: It was so wonderful stay in Clan Hotel. Their service is superb and the room are so comfortable. I spend whole day in the hotel and the hotel was located at a very convenient place which you can get your food immediately from the amoy street.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of my best experiences
desc: Simply breathtaking. The service, the amenities, each details that the entire team took note of made my stay there felt so enjoyable. My partner and myself are really happy and it is our pleasure to be able to patron this wonderful place for our anniversary. Thank you the clan!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing and one of a kind experience
desc: It was a rather exclusive and mysterious entrance, however the concierge staff and counter will catch your eye when you approached. Friendly service from the first you arrive at the concierge counter till the reception check in counters. You will be amazed by the way they greeted with the "kungfu gesture" and a tea experience that immersed you in rich chinese culture. The room was great too with in tap water dispenser for efforts to go green. Breakfast was so generous in portions that you couldn't finish but guaranteed a full tummy after. Local delights that varied daily was served. Overall a really unique experience that differentiate from the others.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service and location
desc: There are many dining options within walking distance, whether you are looking for local food, cafes or fine dining. Hotel is next to a MRT station, accessibility is not a problem. Staff are attentive. The tea ceremony during check in fit very well with the clan image.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clan Hotel
desc: Very nice stay and pleasant experience with the staff! One or the memorable parts was how the entire hotel has the scent of tea, imparting a very calming and homely scent to the whole hotel! The welcome tea and snack was also one very unique to the hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay at The Clan Hotel
desc: Had a really great stay at The Clan Hotel - staff were very friendly and genuine. They were quick to answer to queries, patient and clear, and attended any help needed quickly. The service was really great, from the tea ceremony and little history about Telok Ayer, to the birthday cake and personal note, it really adds a personal touch and makes it a memorable stay. Overall, facilities were super new and kept in good conditions. Room felt inviting and I had amazing views from my room, and the pool. Great location surrounded by great food in the Amoy area. Wonderful stay, thank you team at Clan Hotel!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Hidden 5-Star Gem in CBD Area
desc: Perfect location for a relaxing staycation amidst the hustle and bustle of business activities in the CBD. The Clan Hotel is conveniently located at the intersection of Cross Street and Telok Ayer Street. This is the perfect hotel for a weekend getaway as you can take advantage of its downtown location to walk to dinner, check out the various restaurants and have after dinner drinks, all within walking distance. The hotel is surrounded by eateries from the Market Street Interim Hawker Centre across the street to more upmarket restaurants in the CBD area. If you are a lover of local hawker fare, you would be delighted to know that the iconic La Pat Sat (300m away) and the popular Maxwell Food Centre (650m) are just minutes away by foot. From the outside, you wouldn‚Äôt know that

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation cum birthday celebration at The Clan Hotel
desc: All the staff are very friendly, happy, attentive, alert and helpful! The breakfast was good. This is a very good hotel for business trips though the room rates are slightly on the high side but worth considering.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Romantic staycay turned into Family one!
desc: I booked a 2-night staycay for my husband & I but we ended up bringing our 3 children. The Clan staff went out of their way to accommodate our last minute needs and we ended up having a great time! I originally booked the Premier room with its inclusions but changed the booking to 2x Deluxe connecting rooms to accommodate 2 adults & 3 children. The hotel is brand new, modern, clean and in a great Tanjong Pagar location, right next to Telok Ayer MRT station. Our stay started with a Welcome tea ceremony. We attended the pre-booked inclusive Precinct tour at 4pm on our Day 1 which was fun and insightful! We walked through places we never been before and stopped to have a drink at the Maxwell Food Centre which is supposed to be one of the best hawkers in SG, we returned there the

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Unique and enjoyable staycation
desc: An excellent staycation here at The Clan Hotel. I can understand why this hotel has good reviews as of late. Its purely a business hotel and it does well for that. Rooms are well appointed and modern. There isn't much amenities around the hotel other than the beautiful swimming pool and well appointed gym. Service here is top notch, especially friendly Kenneth and everyone are ever so friendly. Breakfast at Qin restaurant was also delicious. Honestly the Master Series rooms sells itself as its offers good views around the area. Nice touches of the complimentary mini bar and soap selection offers good and unique touch points. Swimming pool is honestly one of the best selling points of the hotel. Yes it is small but it offers a unique view of the surroundings. Overall a good hotel

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Anniversary Stay
desc: The Clan Hotel provided my fianc√© and I with such an amazing service and experience during our stay. Since it was an anniversary stay, they provided us with Complimentary Late Check-Out, Mini Bar and Small Cake. They even had simple and sweet set up in our room when we come in, they provided us with a Welcoming Ceremony as we checked-in which was definitely the highlight of our stay. Hope to be back soon

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clean rooms, good food, good service
desc: This is a good place to stay if you would like to explore the CBD area or head off to the Southern Islands via Marina South Pier's ferry services. Rooms are very clean, service is great, and breakfast was yummy. The complimentary teas (esp. the in-house concoction) were very aromatic - I enjoyed it a lot! The view at the pool (and from our room) is great too. The bed was very comfy. Cost-wise, it was not too expensive as we booked with a Klook promotion.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service, great stay, enjoyable experience
desc: The check in and out process were fuss free. Staff were all attentive and polite. Gym and pool experience are nice and easy to book despite of the pandemic situation. Rooms are spacious and available chrome cast for usage.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan
desc: Personalised Service by the team at The Clan. All of them are very attentive. The hotel is clean and new. It is situated at a very convenient location and it is just a stone‚Äôs throw away from Telok Ayer station.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at Clan Hotel
desc: Excellent service, room and facilities! Enjoyed this staycation so much, love everything about the hotel and the staff were all so professional and service excellence! Made us so at home and comfortable throughout the whole staycation experience! Thank you Clan Hotel! Systems for breakfast and swimming pool bookings are all very organized and well-planned. Complimentary refreshments and tokens were good! I would definitely go back to Clan Hotel again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: More than Excellent
desc: Appreciate the extra welcome and friendliness from staff. Service is more than 5 stars. Rooms are really nice and loved the complementary. Overall, excellent hotel to enjoy weekend, staycation or spend quality time with your loved one. Please keep it up and will visit again soon. Thank you.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Unexpected comfortable stay
desc: Checkin included a tea ceremony and we were ushered by the hotel manager up to our room. In room dining food was affordable but quality can be better. And‚Ä¶ they have bidet! Though the bathroom window was confusing on whether we should roll down the blinds or not cause it allows outside to have direct view of your private moments on the toilet bowl. Breakfast was restricted to one set per pax but it was yummy. We were given a bowl of small porridge after requested for it (knew bout this from online reviews). It was an unexpectedly comfortable stay for us overall.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent experience....
desc: We booked this hotel due to several good reviews. True enough, its an awesome hotel. The room is clean, comfortable and spacious. The staffs are friendly and polite, they provided more than a 5* stars services. We enjoyed and had a wonderful staycation. Thank you very much.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A unique getaway in the heart of the city
desc: Did a one night staycay and the service was great, room was clean with a magnificent view. Gorgeous toilet with a tub and the wife+daughter loved it. The rooftop infinity pool/gym has a magnificent view of the city. A perfect place to watch the sunset and enjoy the evening glow of Singapore.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Definitely recommended!
desc: The staff and services provided was very thoughtful, in terms of the checking in, welcoming tea ceremony and the winding down at night. The place is also very clean and great location as well! Overall very satisfied with the experience!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Clan hotel by Far East
desc: Excellent service by Christine From sales and Kenneth Ong (guest service exec). From booking services to my 1st day (which was today) was jus pure awesome. Just felt it was much more premium then what I have got at other 5 star hotels in Singapore . Would surely come back again without any doubt just for these services rendered. Room was just awesome just like them. Thanks again guys.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Hotel is the place to call your home away from home in Singapore
desc: When you first arrive and enter the hotel "lobby", it's underwhelming as it doesn't have the BIG entrance you'd expect compared to other hotel lobbies but don't judge The Clan Hotel book by it's cover. Reception area is quaint with various items on display and staff were friendly and welcoming, making the check-in process a breeze. Stay awhile and listen. The tea master has a tale to share and what a way to start your stay here! The room I booked is sizeable for couple stay and probably fit a kid for small family. Modern amenities for the discerning traveller/staycationer and I am totally impressed by the bathroom. Let's just say your derriere will thank you and remind you of Japan's offering when it comes to toilet amenities. Did I say the seat is heated?!? Whether you're

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay at the Clan
desc: Staff were friendly and helpful throughout the 3 days 2 nights stay. Facilities and room amenities are clean. Central location with walking distance to nearby attractions and shopping malls. Food is good.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at clan
desc: Good hospitality Good location Interesting experience Love the tea experience Love the smell of the whole hotel Nice infinity pool at L30 However breakfast could have been more generous. Nonetheless they are v proactive

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Super good hospitality!
desc: Feel like fully under the care of the hotel members. Great check in welcome tea experience, comfortable bed/ room and even bath room. Good tea and coffee with complimentary snacks. Clean sky pool and great facilities. Good choice of breakfast. There‚Äôs even wishes from hotel member on my birthday celebration ü§®

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place & convenient!
desc: Location was the best as there were many food options around the hood and walking distance to MRT stations. Stayed over the weekends and it's much quieter and peaceful. The deluxe rooms isn't super huge but I like that it's cosy and simple. Appreciate that all the staff we have come across were really friendly and polite. The little things that counts - love the door gift placed in each rooms specially curated with the hotel's concept, love the effort made to fulfill my request of adjourning rooms since I booked 2 rooms, love the convenience of booking the swimming pool facility. Really enjoyed my stay and hope to visit again one day. Thank you The Clan Hotel!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Modern but maintaining Chinese culture
desc: The hotel has a modern edge to it but at the same time maintaining the Chinese culture in it's interior design. Once you step into L1's lobby, you smell a subtle scent of tea, it's a very welcoming and different smell from the regular big hotels which usually tend to have strong perfume scent! The tea they provide at the reception and hotel rooms are very unique. Highly recommended! Great service and the toilets are very well-equipped!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful stay in The Clan Hotel
desc: Wonderful staycation in Singapore The Clan Hotel, I believe this is one of the best experience that I ever had before. Special thanks to our room tour guy Kenneth Ong who provided a clear speech of room introduction and his attitude is also very good and professional. Service are great from the beginning to the end , room hygiene is definitely 100% well-cleaned , amazing view and high level , definitely will visit here again! Thank you the Clan Hotel for bringing us such a wonderful staycation journey!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Slept like a baby with the Clan
desc: Very grateful to Juvena‚Äôs team for their high level of hospitality, accommodating our requests whenever they could and attending to all our questions well. hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect stay with my friend!
desc: The location is quite central in between Chinatown Point and Lau Pa Sat hawker centre. You can also walk to Marina Sq area or MBS. The room was great! The deal i got from Agoda allows a late check out at 4pm.. and I arrived very early for check in and they still provide us with a room already, so great!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceptional. love the "clan" DNA
desc: Great experience. loved how thoughtful and meticulous each detail is thought out right from the main door where you enter(makes you feel like you are entering a secret clan as the entrance is obscure) to the details in the deco at the reception, to the Qin restaurant when we went for breakfast to the small details and surprises at every nook and crook in the room and at communal areas. Great concept and fantastic service by your crew. sunset view at the infinity pool was exceptional too

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Babymoon Staycation
desc: Had a wonderful staycation experience from arrival to departure. The staff and ambience of the hotel made us feel welcomed and safe. Can't wait to be back at The Clan Hotel again. Truly recommend this

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great place for staycation
desc: The hotel is very clean, with brand new amenities and a very cozy vibe. The staff was really helpful and friendly, accommodating our requests for early check-in/late check-out and sending a complimentary birthday cake to our room. The corner rooms are fantastic, with lots of lounging area by the windows to soak in the view, and the bed is super comfortable. The pool is great, with awesome views on the CBD, and is open very late (till midnight), although too bad the jacuzzi was closed due to COVID-19 restrictions. The breakfast is among the best you can get for a hotel breakfast. The hotel's theme of old/new Asian heritage reflects well in the service with small touches such as the check-in tea ceremony & the turndown service make a big difference. On top of that, the location

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent staycation
desc: There was a welcome tea and snack upon checking in at the beautiful lobby, which sets us on a holiday mood. Hotel is new and clean, the view at the sky pool is awesome, choose a late evening time slot for the pool so that you can enjoy the spectacular sunset.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best staycations in Singapore!
desc: The overall stay was amazing and my partner & I can't wait to be back. We were very impressed by the exceptional service from all the staff and we love the aesthetics and cleanliness of the hotel. Breakfast is exceptional, thank you for the birthday surprise too. It was definitely an unforgettable experience for us. Thank you The Clan Hotel ‚ò∫

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommend Stay
desc: I highly recommended this hotel even though it is not family friendly. Family with 2 or more kids you might want to book premier room and above for more comfort. All the staffs were helpful, friendly and attentive. Hotel was in a tiptop condition. I specifically love the toilet as there‚Äôs washlet. Breakfast was great but it would be great if it is halal so that we could have more varieties. Lastly, we really enjoyed our stay.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful birthday stay with The Clan Hotel
desc: My boyfriend and I stayed at The Clan Hotel for 2 nights celebrating our birthdays. Love the welcome tea session introduced by the Front Office team. The room was spacious and comfortable with a nice city view. Location was great with restaurants and MRT station within walking distance. Complimentary birthday cakes were also served to us in the room in a cute cage and a scroll with handwritten message by the team - this added a really nice touch of personalisation. Thank you The Clan Hotel for such a pleasant stay!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay
desc: The staggered check-in was really a good approach especially during this COVID-19 pandemic. The hotel has the best rain shower which I have experienced so far. The breathtaking view Sky Gym is opened round the clock and equipped with a wide selection of equipment. I enjoyed the virtual fitness classes with my family. Overall is good as it is a new hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Front office is good

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Really enjoyed my stay! Great service!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: staycation experience at Clan hotel
desc: Overall it was a pleasant stay at Clan hotel. Celebrated my birthday there and was surprised with a small cake. Requested for a late check out and was granted. Kudos to the staff for being so accomodating to our requestüòä

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay at Clan
desc: I had a very wonderful experience at the Clan including the meals (dinner and breakfast ) at Qin. Truly delightful with many twists made to the tastebuds. I was pleasantly surprised by the offer of an early check-in when Adrian from reception called me the day before to arrange. That really gave me the time to savour the room and the view that came along with it. The manager at Qin was also very personable and the staff at the restaurant were aware of our dinner booking later when we went there for the 1-for-1 sunset cocktails. The vibe is friendly. A comment for improvement: The toilet kept making some noise. We were not sure where the sensor and how to override it. Some info on that will be great unless ours is faulty

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation - Guest Service Executive Mr Kenneth Ong
desc: I went for staycation at The Clan Hotel for my 1st year wedding anniversary. Mr Kenneth Ong served us to do check in. Mr Kenneth Ong was so professional in terms of explaining hotel regulation with COVID-19 pandemic outlines. So welcoming and pleasant service he provide us from the lobby to our room. He brought us to our room and explained every single features in the room! And surprisingly this hotel had warm seat bidet in the toilet! Also not forgetting, how well hotel has been maintaining sanitization and cleanness for hotel guest. I sincerely thank Mr Kenneth Ong for giving us a such a warm welcoming and being patient when we asked so much questions. Thank you.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good place
desc: Overall, the service was good. Staff are polite and helpful The welcome tea ceremony was really special. Room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Definitely will recommend this hotel as we really like it there.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb!
desc: It was a splendid stay. The hotel is super clean, facilities are pristine and the staff are next level! Amazing attention to detail and superb service at every junction. Breakfast was great and the cocktails were made to perfection. Highly Recommended

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at The Clan Hotel
desc: Happy to stay at The Clan Hotel as I found out that it is new (opened this year!), very clean and liked using the amenities such as the gym and the swimming pool. Only thing that was a pity was that the jacuzzi was closed (due to COVID) ): But aside from that, everything was great from the service to the breakfast at QIN (there are various choices). Was very blessed to be able to stay at quite a high level (at the 28th floor! Yay!) and the view from the room was superb! Thank you The Clan Hotel for providing such an awesome experience for my stay, totally recommend!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great new boutique hotel
desc: We had a great staycation here. The staff here are very friendly and attentive. The room (grand premier) while not huge was adequate for 2 people. The room comes with some goodies (snacks and drink) as well as breakfast (you choose from a number of items). There is a pool and gym on the top floor was incredible views of singapore. There are plenty of restaurants near by so you don‚Äôt need to eat in the hotel - you can go to any number located behind the hotel or even a short walk to club st or even boat quay. This hotel is also very well located for business travellers working in raffles place. I would have no issue staying here again

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nothing went wrong, best staycay ever.
desc: Planned a last minute celebration, my first time too. The Clan Team went above and beyond, provided recommendations, helped me with the delivery arrangements & most importantly contactless experience for food deliveries to the room. The entire team was really friendly, personal & understanding - which makes the stay much more memorable than the others. It's worth every cent and don't get me started on the facilities - just for the room itself, it's worth. Get the breakfast too, no regrets. Swimming pool had a maintenance but the facilities manager was very kind to extend an exception to us just so we could enjoy it a little more. Overall, I appreciate the hotel's combined effort and the TEA MASTER was

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality

Covid pack, expresso coffee machine, chinese tea, lazy couch, a long bench at the end of the bed. There was even a Toto heated toilet seat. All the necessary amenities were in place. The pool with the view was excellent, 8pax max

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The perfect Staycaytion gateway! Service unlike any other.
