Not only was my request granted, Qiu Ni also arranged for a small cake to be delivered to the room as it

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: amazing experience
desc: it was an awesome place! We really enjoyed out stay , the staff were very warmth and welcoming too. Would recommend this place to our family and friends for staycation next time! the rooms are very nice too

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great staycation
desc: Was a great place for a staycation with a lot of f&b options around. Locals driving there, be informed the hotel shares a carpark with the adjacent building so either drop off your luggage at the hotel and park the car or be prepared for a couple minutes' walk to the entrance.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A memorable staycation experience
desc: We had very fond memories of our stay in the Premier Room. We booked it for my birthday celebration and the hotel surprise me with message and balloons on the bed! We collected the alphabet cards and display it back at home. The view is super good, and allows a lot of lights in. I like the bay window seats with the tea set, where i can chill out day and night, reading my book and magazine while sipping on their very fragrant osmanthus tie guan yin tea. Besides message on bed, the hotel gave me a nice cake too. I love the long bath service, this is the first time i do not have to run the bath water myself. The service is very personalised, I received a birthday scroll and cards for my baths, this is the kind of service that makes the difference and touches my heart. The only area

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation Grand Premier Room
desc: Second time staying at The Clan. Great service from the staffs again at The Clan, room is great, finishing touches of the furniture feels premium. Enjoyed the huge TV and the great views from the room. Won't hesitate to stay again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Enjoyable stay!
desc: Enjoyed our stay at The Clan! It was the first time and the entire check in process was smooth. We were treated to some tea and salty pasty (tao sar piah) as our welcome snack before proceeding to the room to check in. The room was cosy & perfect for our night stay!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing stay!
desc: Stayed for 3 days 2 nights. The ambience of the hotel and the whole experience was amazing!! The gym oversaw the city. The pool is at the top and had a lovely view too but the cleanliness could be better. The rooms were very functional and cosy

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and Pleasant Stay
desc: Everything was good. Breakfast was not buffet style, its per set but the portion is enough for 1 pax. Staffs were friendly, room is clean. Service was great. Room and pool was abit small compared to other hotels but its enough. Overall, it was comfortable stay.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely stay
desc: Room was clean and bed is comfortable. Especially love the heated toilet seat. We don‚Äôt get this often with hotels in Singapore. Only downside was the slow drainage in the shower. Besides that, all the staffs provided us with excellent service, always so accommodating and helpful. Overall, a pleasant stay and I‚Äôm happy to be back.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Hotel to stay in
desc: Top services from all Hotel staffs include Qin Restaurant. Facilities are great. Room is clean , very comfortable bed and delicious breakfast selections (Porridge is very nice). Sky Pool although small but has a very nice view. Overall , I had a wonderful staycation here, my family and kid love it so much, we will definitely going back there again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: You know what. Clan is awesome, but the Vyan is the best.
desc: This is our second stay. And i can tell you easily, Vyan is really what brings out our stay. Previously had my proposal for my long time girlfriend, and you guessed it, this time for our wedding stay. Off the bet, Vyan was the go-to person for all our things, from room issues, to even just even future bookings, Vyan did exercise all her will for our comfort. This time round, our stay was more than enjoyable. It was really magnificent. I hope my reviews may indeed show how great Vyan is and has become, like my previous review of Clan, please reward Vyan handsomely. You indeed got my third booking in March 2022 purely because of Vyan.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Service, Ambience and Experience
desc: Really great experience at The Clan. Their furniture and decor used really catches your attention and makes you feel at ease. We were welcomed with a tea and snack and was brought to our room. The room was very clean, ambience was great and the room had a great view. Will definitely come back to visit again. Thanks for making our stay a great one!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay!
desc: I've requested a higher floor for my birthday, not only did they manage to fulfill my request but they've also delivered a cake! Also, the seating at the Qin Restaurants is quite limited. However, appreciate that the staff has arranged for the breakfast to be delivered to the room so that we can still enjoy it without waking up too early. The location is really superb as well, it's convenient to go everywhere as the MRT is just opposite the hotel. I had a great time at The Clan Hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Decor and food
desc: Juts finished my 3D2N staycation there and it was worth every dollar. The hotel has one of the nicest and most unique decors I've seen. The welcome snack and tea was much appreciated and the staff were unfailingly accomodating and polite despite my many requests. Room was very nicely decorated and the breakfast selection was awesome. Thanks to all the staff there for a wonderful time!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycaytion at The Clan Hotel
desc: The grand premier room was nice and clean with a very nice view. The bathtub was quite decent and we could request for a bath to be made. The staff were responsive and fast on our requests and very friendly.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful stay at The Clan Hotel
desc: The staff were sincere, genuine and welcoming. The in-room amenities were exceptional and modern. The dishes and food quality at Qin Restaurant is superb. It's highly recommended for in-house guests and members of the public as well.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent stay
desc: Besides writing the wrong room number on our key card and leading to us knocking on the wrong room door, the hotel was very clean and convenient to a lot of bars and cafes. The decor was suited to our tastes. Bed was one of the comfiest we have slept on as well.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic experience
desc: Hotel was new and clean. Staff were friendly and efficient. Do note that breakfast is not included and has to be paid separately (not buffet style as well). For those driving, the carpark is right beside the hotel and you will be given 1 free exit ticket per day. Otherwise, the hotel is located in the middle of CBD so it is extremely convenient to take public transport as well. I would highly recommend to give this hotel a try.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A wonderful stay, definitely coming back for another staycation.
desc: It was a staycation for my girlfriend‚Äôs birthday weekend and a long overdue break from our busy work schedule so our expectations were high. The Clan Hotel has exceeded our expectations from the moment we checked in all the way till the end. The staff were friendly and thoughtful, even sending a beautiful birthday cake for my girlfriend. They were able to accommodate us by allowing us to check out late (at 2pm) instead of their standard timing (12pm). The room was cosy and beautiful, we felt like we had everything we needed in the room. The only issue we had was probably trying to use Chromecast on the tv, but we brought our laptops so it wasn‚Äôt a big issue. Overall, we had a memorable experience and will definitely return for another stay!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great hotel for couples
desc: Very nice hotel, service was excellent and location is perfect. 2 mins walk from the MRT and there are 2 malls just beside the hotel. The staff are very friendly, making you feel like you are home. Will definitely come back soon.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: excellent hotel with views of cbd
desc: had a wonderful stay at The Clan. loved how big and spacious the room was and the views it offered. pool was peaceful and quiet when i booked it for the morning of my check out. gave me a bday cake too!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fabulous stay! Highly recommended!
desc: So much to rave about The Clan Hotel! Where do I start - Service was fab; the receptionist who assisted my friend and me with our check-in also gave us a quick room tour. The housekeeping staff was prompt when we requested for extra amenities too. Super prompt may I add; they came up in an instant right after I hung up. Prior to our room tour, we were also given a welcome snack and a cuppa tea with a hot towel to freshen up. Definitely adds a nice touch to the start of the staycay. The room had some great amenities like: - A Swivel LCD TV Wall Mount that allowed casting which enabled us to watch Netflix and whatnot rather than the standard TV programmes (doesn‚Äôt seem like a big deal but it is really one when you notice most hotels lacking the said features) - A heated bidet

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Overall, the stay was great. The location is central and accessible to many food options and surrounded with rich heritage. The service by the hotel was great and front desk staff during check-in was helpful and offered to welcome us with the traditional tea and pastry. We loved the tea collab too.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful hotel for staycation and more
desc: As this was the first time my mum and I stayed at the Clan hotel, it was a refreshing stay for us to have a change of scenery within Singapore. This started off with the great service from the service staff such as Rommel who welcomed us & gave us a corner room with an excellent view of the Amoy area. The little treats all the way from the tea ceremony down to the furoshiki in the room really gave an elegant first impression hardly seen in some of the Singapore hotels these days.. We also appreciated the amenities in the hotel such as the nice terrace sitting area to relax and read books to the pool area on the top floor with wonderful scenic views.. oh yes, it‚Äôs always a wonderful bonus to know that the toilets are all TOTO (Japanese toilets are always such a blessing!) We

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan
desc: Good hotel to stay and rest but the carpet when we sit on it very fury so it stuck on our pants, it also good location as it easier to get halal food there w\as there is telor ayer food market. i stayed on high floor so i love the view. swimming at night is awesome!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome stay!
desc: The overall experience was superb! The staffs are friendly and I like their service. Location of the hotel is good as it‚Äôs just within 1min walk to the MRT station and close to a lot of eateries. Will definitely come back again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel
desc: The service is excellent and the concept of this hotel is refreshing. It is located at a prime area where you can get good food all from walking distance. Except the swimming pool is a bit too cold to swim in the night.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best hotel staycay in Singapore
desc: The Clan Hotel is new, clean, service-oriented, great amenities, location. Everything is perfect. They even have a 55 inch tv in every room regardless of different tier, you can connect it via Chromecast to watch Netflix, Disneyplus and many more. The toilet seat is heated which is exact same as the ones you see in Japan. Rain shower has good pressure. Bed is comfortable and huge.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Modern reinvention of historic aesthetic
desc: Overall, The Clan hotel will delight most guest accustomed to a city centre hotel. The building is on a small site but makes up with its centrality and excellent transport connectivity. The aestheic is very pleasing and this carries into the rooms and various common spaces. Staff were also very attentive and pleasing to engage with.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Purely amazing
desc: Beautiful hotel! Had an really amazing stay. Hotel added very nice touches as it was my fianc√©‚Äôs birthday. That opening tea ceremony like Dr Strange when he went to Kamar Taj (Marvel movie reference). Will return for sure. For 5 star experience book here. For 6 star experience, look for Kenneth. Unbelievable service to make our stay even better.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Exceeded expectations
desc: Best hotel in town! We were warmly greeted with tea ceremony! Upon check out, we were given a departure gift. Very sweet of them! The hotel is amazing and very clean! Has the zen feeling too. Room was cozy! Fell in love with the bathroom. Heated toilet bowl with auto cleaning function! We did a top up for breakfast (because we did not opt for breakfast when booking) and it was so good! No regrets! Amazing view from the sky infinity pool and sky gym. Variety of gym equipment such as trx suspension trainer, kettlebells, rowers, etc. Had a relaxing staycation and we would love to book a stay here again! Thank you for the amazing hospitality and experience! We will definitely be back!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Staycation with Beautiful Skyline
desc: During the Diwali holiday, we stayed at The Clan Hotel which is very new and has good service. The refurbished hotel feels like a museum as there are explanations of how the Chinese immigrants set their foot in Singapore and the culture grew. It is also nice to see a different view of the office area during the night time. Most importantly, the service quality is very high. I will like to commend that Tommy Lee did a good job of serving me during breakfast. In fact, the whole restaurant and concierge team did well in terms of service.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan hotel Singapore
desc: Room is clean, comfy and view from our room is nice. The breakfast which was included is superbly yummy. Which could put kempiski, Fullerton Bay and St Regis to shame. The pool is nice and the evening view is beautiful.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Stay was above expectations
desc: Upon check-in, there was a welcome tea reception by the Tea Master. The staff even gave a room tour, and explained the amenities and facilities available. They do not provide bottled water, as they have premium drinking water tap, located at the toilet sink. Room was great, with complimentary snacks and tea set with tea leaves to enjoy during your stay. So far, this is the only hotel that has chromecast ready TV, so you do not have to worry about not having any shows to watch on the TV.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel in the city
desc: Room was clean Service was superb Like the interior of the hotels Staff service was excellent Check in was hassle free and there‚Äôs a welcome tea ceremony. Really love the vibes of the hotel modern luxury theme

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: Great service provided by the hotel and the people were really friendly and welcoming to the hotel. Good variety of food selection of in room dining for my first time experience. Will definitely return back to stay :)

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice to be here, food are around can find out easily , just dissatisfied with the makeup room lol
desc: One point that really dissatisfied is, I can't request the makeup room for the next day of my check in, I'm request in the morning, check out is evening, why can't be??I'm not understand with, I hope it change , I will be back again lah

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Decent Getaway Staycation
desc: Hotel is fairly decent with an amazing outlook and its very own tea cultured based theme. Facilities were new and clean. The view is amazing considering a high rise building near the CBD area. It is an ideal trip if ya looking for somewhere quiet, a chilled short getaway staycation. Plus point if you like tea.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Hotel
desc: Although the room is rather small but the service, cleanliness and location make my stay worthwhile. During the check in, one of the staff took notice of my birthday and initiated to deliver a cake over to the room.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Recommended Stay!
desc: We stayed here at the Deluxe Room for a night on the 10th Nov to celebrate my birthday. (I realised there are a lot of online reviews from guests who were also celebrating their birthdays at this hotel, for some reason!) Service was great, and staff were attentive to your needs. For example, at breakfast one of them noticed I was looking for something at my table, and prompted whether I needed any help (which he was right, as I was looking for salt and pepper). The room was also clean and comfortable during our stay Depending on whom you ask, the gym is either small or spacious, we found it to be more of the latter category, and comes with various on-demand workout programmes which you can select to be shown on their huge multi-screen. But if you are a fan of machines, you may

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at The Clan
desc: It was a good staycation. Service was good, staff were attentive and polite, room was clean. Location is accessible and convenient. Many food choices surrounding the hotel for you to choose. Although we didn‚Äôt use the gym, facility looks well equipped. The swimming pool is abit small but the overlooking view is awesome.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good location and friendly staffs
desc: The location is excellent. The staffs are helpful and friendly. The room is clean and the water pressure in the bathroom is good. Overall experience was good. Would recommend this hotel but not too sure about family with small children.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Adrian is Simply excellent!
desc: It was a thoroughly enjoyable stay in clan- in part because of the beautiful classic meets modern feel of the property but especially because of the exceptional service provided. Whilst all the staff were fantastic in their own right, I have to single out Adrian De Castro for praise. Our initial booking plans had to be modified as we had an unforeseen circumstance pop up and had to reschedule. Under the circumstances, it wasnt the easiest task to help change the booking but Adrian went the extra mile to make it as seamless for us as possible despite facing some internal hurdles. Upon arrival, he was extremely accommodating from start to finish, even assisting in scheduling a comfortable time for my partner and I to go for breakfast. He was always in a jovial mood and forthcoming

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely hotel, but needs a bit of polish...
desc: The hotel itself, I can't fault. The location is excellent - very convenient for all types of different trips - near the CBD for business, parks and entertainment for families and restaurants and bars for couples/solo travellers. The property was exceptionally well presented and very clean. The food (room service and breakfast) from QIN restaurant was exceptional. Unfortunately, there were a few small issues that need a bit of "polish" to really elevate The Clan to a propper 5 star hotel experience. Firstly, although professional and efficient - none of the staff were especially friendly or welcoming. Also, at one point, when trying to order room service I called every, single available option on the phone auto-dial at least 3 times each and none of them answered. I ended up

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel
desc: Very clean and comfortable room. All are well maintain and good. The premium room has excellent view and comfortable bed. The swimming pool is impressive and great view. The staff will friendly and responsive when help is needed. The gym was clean and workout with very nice views on the 30th level Will stay again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable & Modern
desc: Isolation Stay - November Modern, comfortable. Good bed & large shower/bathroom. Isolation/SHN is reasonably highly priced, but includes 3 meals. Food is quite good (albeit delivered cold mostly.) Hotel was quite responsive to requests and deliveries are quickly brought up to the room. A proper working chair in the room would be useful for business/longer stays where guests need to work. The little stool is not great for the back.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Unique heritage experience
desc: Beautifully designed to reflect the heritage area in which it is nestled, the entrance to the hotel imitates entry to an opium den or the tight quarters of the early immigrants of the Telok Ayer area. Yet state-of-the-art technology provides a gigantic smart TV screen, heated Toto toilet and bidet, filtered water from the tap and a posh safe large enough for your laptop. Divine plump pillows on a comfortable in Queen bed. Really appreciated that we we were given the 27th floor without our asking. Stupendous view of the restored Chinatown shophouses, not to mention the view from the pool on the 30th floor, tiny lap pool but the infinity drop-over-the edge makes up for it! Bit cold though in the morning. Outstanding staff, would like to thank the young lady who rushed up to help

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing Staycation
desc: Had a wonderful stay at Clan Hotel recently. The welcome reception given to us after registration was a pleasant surprise. The room was compact with everything in place. Room service was impeccable and the staff are very polite. Breakfast served the following morning was good too. Would definitely return again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 2d1n stay, deluxe room
desc: Hotel was easy to locate building from telok ayer mrt. Check in: Staff were pleasant and prompt in service. Took about 15 mins though. Room: cosy, clean. Funny that we had to draw the blinds in the toilet for privacy. Breakfast: Qin breakfast and Continental breakfast were pretty impressive. Check out: Quite fast, pleasant staff. Overall a very pleasant stay, 10/10 would recommend/return.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Highly recommended!
desc: Superb!!!! Love the room... Exceptional view and great ambiance. Awesome Sky Pool, delicious breakfast, great service from staffs. Super convenient location; surrounded by F&B; from Hawker Centre to Fine Dining Restaurants.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great service and cleanliness
desc: Service was very prompt and cleanliness of the property and room was very good! Fast check in and check out! Breakfast service delivered to the room was an absolute idea to dine in the comfort of our room.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay
desc: I find the room a bit small but acceptable for just 2 of us. Service & cleanliness was excellent. Location, needless to say, lots of food and chill out places around. Walking distance to chinatown, abs, Fullerton, boat & clark quay area. good to take a slow walk and enjoy the city view.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely experience, will be back
desc: The staffs are extremely helpful and welcoming. Room is spacious and has all the amenities needed. Room and bathroom is really really clean, particularly love the automatic toilet. Definitely will be back!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation at The Clan Hotel
desc: Check In 16/12/21 -18/12/21 The concierge - as soon as my wife and I informed at the entrance that we are checking in, they escorted us immediately to the lift lobby while hitting the gong as a sign of welcome. Reception + tea ceremony- the male receptionist check us in, quick and smooth. He was very warming and welcoming. While waiting for room to be ready, he prepared for us chinese tea and mini lotus bun and explained to us the meaning of it. Two ladies at the receptionist updated us on the situation of the room. Room - We got the Grand Premiere Room. Room is beautiful. 2802 have a wonderful open view. Room amneties top notch. Toilet seat is auto like japanese style seats with built in seat warmer and bidet. Lots of tv channels. Wifi is good. Room is spotless clean.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic experience at The Clan Hotel
desc: I usually don't write reviews, so this should mean something. For starters, we booked one of the Master series room and we were blown out of dimension for The Clan Hotel's service quality. If you're willing to pay a premium at Hai Di Lao for their 5 star dining service, I recommend that you MUST try to be accommodated at The Clan Hotel. Service was top-notch throughout our stay. From the check-in till check-out, booking of Qin Restaurant, requesting for hotel amenities, and loved the birthday surprise as well! Had dinner at Qin Restaurant. Their delicacies really complemented the awesome service experienced by The Clan Hotel. We really felt like a part of The Clan throughout our stay. Genuinely if I could give a 7/5 I would!!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: We were surprised that the hotel staff noted the birthday of the guest and sent a birthday cake to our room. Very hospitable gesture and heartwarming. The skypool has a very nice view of the surrounding Chinatown area.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good hotel
desc: Thank you Yvon( from the front desk) for your help to find coronavirus testing near by! Everyone at the front desk was very helpful and accommodating, which makes a difference. This website states that there is a free breakfast, I don't think it is accurate. Special thanks to a room cleaning team on 13th floor as they did a very good job. Our room had a filtered water which was amazing. The hotel is located very close to multiple subway stations, which is very convenient.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: First time and definitely will not be the last time. Really loved the hotel interior design and cleanliness, friendly and helpful staff, and top notch facilities :) recommended for a getaway with family and friends

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful staycay at The Clan Hotel
desc: This visit was a night in the hotel's Grand Premier Room at The Clan Hotel by Far East. The check in experience was a pleasant one, and the hotel is currently operating staggered time slots and so you will have to indicate what is your preferred slot for your check in a few days before your stay. Check in was mostly a painless experience except that guests might feel lost when all the counters are full and may not know where to stand/sit while waiting to check in. It would have been better if the reception had some additional folks to help guide guests who are waiting to a waiting area or corner instead of letting them stand around lost. Other than that, the check in itself was a very smooth and painless one, and the staff were mostly polite and professional for the entire

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 4D3N Birthday Staycation
desc: I book The Clan Hotel to celebrate my boyfriend's birthday in advance. The services provided by all staff were excellent and thoughtful. Receptionist even bring us up to our room to explain their hotel and room amenities. They even prepare a cake and letter for my boyfriend, really appreciated it. Enjoy our stay there very much and do not wish to go!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: staycay
desc: one of the best I've ever stayed at! Service was excellent and the food (breakfast) was amazing! they even surprised us with a cake because it was my honeymoon. the room had all the necessary amenities like including umbrella and masks, hand sanitisers, bathrobes. Highly recommended!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Birthday staycay!
desc: It was a good birthday staycay! The hotel staff were great. They even attached a Happy Birthday scroll on my complimentary cakeüòÜ. I think the strength of the hotel is the staff interaction. My personal feel is that its a great fantastic business hotel. Abit divided on using it for a staycation. The room was functional and a good size most likely because i booked a premier room. It was a open concept room as in the clothes rack was open space. No need to open cupboard doors so it definitely felt more spacious. Toilet wise i love it becos no bathtub. There is a place for you to wash your feet and rainshower is plus point and the pressure was so smooth that i will stay on showering for hours but i will waste waterüòÖ There isn‚Äôt a cafe for a quick cake or coffee or to sip

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: New, Clean n nice.
desc: Feel very welcomed and nice place to stay in during our staycay and has one of the nicest view in the cbd area. Some rooms have a nice view of the esplanade although it is partially blocked. Overall a nice hotel to stay in and I will visit again

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Stranded in Singapore with Style
desc: Beautiful hotel in an interesting area. The dark colours and high ceilings were very calming and serene. Check in was a breeze, and we got to partake in the welcome tea ceremony. I appreciated that the staff informed us that the hotel restaurant was not halal certified and during the tea ceremony, the tea master assured us that the tau sar piah pastry is halal certified (and it was delicious!). The room itself is aesthetically decorated. The shower area was super spacious and the water pressure was great. The toilet has a toilet seat bidet, which is a real hoot #gotbidetcanstay Room amenities were standard, our room came with free minibar of snacks and soft drinks. Nespresso and tea is also available. We also tried out the Sky gym and pool on the 30th floor. The gym is

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Staycation
desc: We did not have a good rest due to the noise from the automated toilet sensor. Also, water was dripping through the night. Not too sure what was the issue, but not a good experience in this room. Hopefully this can be improved.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 2D1N Staycation at The Clan Hotel Singapore
desc: Nice cozy room with good view of the business district. We got 26th floor. 2nd time Staycation. Full occupancy in view of festive season. Tea ceremony was presented by Master Alex. Breakfast was excellent. All breakfast served with main course (we chose The Qin, there were 6 mains to choose from including continental breakfast and daily chef special) with eggs, fruit bowl, toast, free flow of juices and coffee/tea.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Gem in the Business District
desc: Firstly hotel is in a perfect location with eateries all around. Secondly they have complimentary parking so you can definitely bring your car along for your stay. Service wise was tip top with a smooth check in together with the room orientation by the front desk staff Diana. Housekeeping team was super with the cleanliness of the room throughout the stay. Pool was cozy and nice with prebookings required during these uncertain times with stunning views of the sunset. Did not use the gym but it looks good and it is indeed 24 hours. The chilling area like the reception lounge area and the area outside the gym is well decorated and insta worthy too Room amenities are nice and even the cultural element of the tea, personalised hand made soap and welcome one time mini bar was

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Pleasant Stay
desc: I haven't written a hotel review for ages but decided to leave one as I was impressed with the Clan Hotel. Had a staycation here yesterday. The interiors were on point, exuding chinese culture and yet not overpowering. The sky pool and gym was amazing for photos. The only lacking point was that it was difficult to book a pool slot though my check in was on a Sunday. Although I was advised that I am on the waitlist, when I visited the pool to take a look at my waitlisted time, there was no one at the pool. The gym is the nicest gym I have seen so far in all the hotels (local and overseas). However, the video on demand doesn't seem to be working. Can't seem to get the video started. Location was perfect as well. The tea ceremony was a lovely touch. Will definitely come back

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: excellent customer service
desc: the rooms were really spacious with a great view. absolutely loved the attention to detail and guests' needs -- the room already has a range of coffee, tea, and snacks, but they've gone above and beyond by providing essential oil + tea to wind down at night. the welcome tea + snack was a nice touch too. we were there for my partner's birthday and we were surprised with cake and a handwritten note. and this is just the basic aspects of their service -- there were also heritage tours and workshop suggestions available among other things. would recommend this to couples, friends and solo guests who are looking for a nice place to relax and unwind in. the location's great too!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Awesome
desc: Lovely place. Lovely reception to welcoming tea. The pool was really windy! Kind of freezing even at noon time on a cloudy day. Room service staff even at the wee hours of 3am still lively and energetic.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Modern yet traditional!
desc: Have been looking at The Clan Hotel and loved its modern and sleek designs! There was a slight hiccup at the start but service recovery was swift. Would have been a seamless experience if all depts, from housekeeping to front office could ensure 100% satisfaction before handing the room over to guests. Nevertheless, it doesnt taint my view of The Clan Hotel. Afterall, it's only about a month shy from turning a year old and i'm sure it will only get better. And oh, the breakfast at Qin restaurant was great too! Thanks to Sam Gil for going the extra mile.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Decent Business hotel with proactive and friendly staff
desc: Met Joanne 2 week earlier as we were around the area. She was very friendly and proactive, brought us around to look at communal areas, and even took initiative to get us a room on a higher level and arranged for amenities for our Anniversary. Will recommend this hotel for couples without kids and business travelers

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: one of the best staycaytion
desc: 1) Very!! conveniently located right at Telok Ayer MRT with the array of shophouses/ restaurants/ cafes/ bars within the vicinity of the hotel. 2) Visually!! pleasing to the eye. The lobby, sky pool and gym, QIN restaurant and the room were very aesthetically designed- concept was refreshing. Natural lighting shining in with their floor to ceiling bronze tinted glass panels. Room was rly clean and had a nice scent! 3) EXCELLENT!! service crew. staff were extremely helpful and friendly. called 2 days prior to check if we could arrive earlier since it was a weekday and staff took note of it - room was prepared by the time we reached at 12pm. Hotel was giving the Clan Care Kit for their 1yr anniversary to those that booked directly. special thanks to Rachel, who took the extra

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good option for short stay
desc: A new stylish hotel at great location. Rooms are nice and modern, staff is attentive. Bed is very compfy with some nice room views. A couple of things though: - room aircon in absurdly loud even at the lowest fan level - the chair in the room has no back rest. Can‚Äôt imagine working in the room for too long - limited breakfast choice but there are good options nearby Overall easy to recommend, but there are some better value options nearby ( Capri, Oasia).

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Grand view of both modern and old times
desc: stylish hotel with tasty decorations and renovation inside room. stunning view on top of hotel, soaking in the rooftop swimming pool, you can see both the modern downtown and old Chinatown views. Comfortable room furniture, and super sleep experience with high quality of bed lines and pillows. Breakfast options a bit simple and taste not so satisfying, Staff could be more attentive and efficient

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Best Boutique Hotel Experience Ever
desc: wonderful experience from check in to check out. great service. very happy with the gym and pool usage. located around so many great food options - both cheap local and fancy food in Qin restaurant was also great. breakfast was fantastic. the only downside is really just the cost of a dish at Qin that we had for dinner. it was a prawn noodle that cost $38++ and it had only 1 prawn in it, sliced into 2. broth was great, but was still very stingy and didn't deserve the price tag if it didn't include any other ingredients at all.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Far exceeded expectations
desc: Service was amazing, the staff are so helpful and kind. The hotel smells amazing, like tea. They gave us a tea ceremony when we came in aswell! The faculties were clean, the room had a nice view and quite spacious. Gave us a complimentary umbrella which seems really high quality at the end of our stay aswell. Would highly recommend this, especially over the more established usual hotels.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience at the Clan
desc: The welcome at The Clan was unliked any other I had in Singapore. A bit quirky in a good way (won't ruin the surprise). The room is equipped very modernly, with a Japanese toilet, great views & very functional. Not the biggest but depending on what you look for that shouldn't be an issue. Breakfast is very decent as well and the pool views are great. Great central location as well. Recommended!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: First time stay at The Clan Singapore was very enjoyable.
desc: We had a lovely 7 night-stay at The Clan Hotel. The staff was very helpful. The room was comfortable with nice amenities. The breakfast was fabulous. Beautiful city views from my hotel room and from the rooftop pool and hot tub. It is very well located with lots of wonderful food choices within easy walking distance.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Comfortable and Cosy Hotel
desc: This hotel is at a great location and easily accessible by Telok Ayer MRT. There are many bars, cafes and restaurants nearby. The room is cosy and clean. It is a great place for relaxation. I stayed at the 28th floor and the view was fantastic.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Fantastic Hotel with Excellent Services!
desc: Great hotel. Although the room may be small, the space is well-designed with every inch of space being able to be utilitized. The water pressure in the shower is fantastic. I would say this is the best rain shower pressure that I have encountered across maby hotels that I have stayed. Sound proofing is good as I don't hear any noise at all throughout my stay. Services are fantastic and all the staff provide warm and friend services. Had a very well rested staycay. Already looking forward to my next stay in May!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Super pleasant and comfortable!!!
desc: ‚Ä¢Restful stay as the rooms are adjustably bright and comfortable. ‚Ä¢Toilet is well equipped and looks clean and well maintained. Water pressure and temperature is easy to control. ‚Ä¢Gym and pool are available but we didn‚Äôt use at the time. ‚Ä¢Spoilt for food. Great location surrounded by an excellent mix of both modern and traditional eateries at FESquare and the rows of shophouses nearby. ‚Ä¢Well-linked transport. Next to Telok Ayer MRT and near to Chinatown and CBD area. ‚Ä¢Friendly, mostly very personal staff with good service. ‚Ä¢Pleasant business-styled hotel with dark interior and decor theme. ‚Ä¢Has a Chinese/local contemporary fusion cuisine within the same building (qin). ‚Ä¢Housekeeping is good and concierge is helpful. Notes ‚Ä¢Car park is at Far East Square (FES).

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great Stay!
desc: I had a great staycation at Clan Hotel. Manager showed me to my room, she was very nice and friendly. The Premium Room I booked was spacious and very comfortable. The hotel would be celebrating its 1st Year Anniversary soon and to my surprise, a small cake was sent up to my room on the first night. That was a very nice surprise! Breakfast at Qin was delicious. The western set‚Äôs portion was huge. As for the sky pool, it was also nice to swim in. I enjoyed the heated jacuzzi the most, as I didn‚Äôt expect it to be heated. In all, Clan Hotel left a fantastic impression on me. Location is also unbeatable as Telok Ayer MRT is just located right outside the hotel.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Warm and welcoming
desc: Staying at The Clan was more than a 5 star experience. Everyone was warm, the room (especially the seat warmer and complimentary coffee) was exquisite and the food left our mouths watering for more Looking forward to our next visit already!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Superb service and clean stay
desc: We were greeted warmly at the reception and the check in was smooth. There were complimentary beverages for us to consume as well. We were pleasantly surprised by the facilities of the room and the sky pool. We had breakfast the next day at the restaurant and the food was excellent. There was also a tea ceremony at the end of our stay and it was a great way to end our stay. Overall, we felt welcomed and enjoyed ourselves thoroughly.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: One of the best hotels to stay
desc: One of the best hotels to have a staycation at, especially if you‚Äôre celebrating an event. View from the room is amazing and toilet have bidet with heated seat! Also, the swimming pool is a must go, with beautiful view especially during the sunset. Customer service is excellent and great. Really love the smooth service provided by the staff, from checking in all the way to checking out.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Wonderful Experience
desc: My husband and I visited The Clan Hotel for our staycation, and it was a wonderful experience for us. We receive by the front desk receptionist Joanne, her warm personality gives us a very good impression since the beginning of our stay. Joanna‚Äôs service is really awesome, she has a spirit of excellence and she goes extra miles to help us to fulfill our needs throughout our stay. Thank you Joanne for being so awesome! You are really amazing! Our housekeeping staff Fei Yan is also very good, she has a strong sense of responsibility and she is excellence in housekeeping sanitation, safety, comfort and aesthetics for the hotel guests. hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing staycation
desc: The service from the beginning when I checked in till the day I checked out was super amazing. They are very accommodating and are always attending to help within 5 mins. The room is really cosy and the view is pretty. it's location is at the heart of CBD with amazing restaurants and cafes surrounding the hotel. Swimming pool had a great view despite the small area. Thankful for the staffs who helped me out with my needs.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Most amazing stay thus far
desc: We had an amazing stay at The Clan. The process of both check-in and check-out were smooth. Kenneth attended to us during check-in and brought us through the journey of The Clan over a welcome tea session. They even prepared a cake a us in celebration of our honeymoon. Breakfast, gym, swimming pool were awesome too! Highly recommended and will definitely plan for a staycation at The Clan again!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A boutique gem in the heart of old-Singapore!
desc: Located in the heart of Chinatown, check-in was easy, with welcome tea a nice touch. Juvena at Front Desk served us and was polite & professional. She brought us to our Grand Premier room and gave us a brief tour of the room. The Grand Premier room is luxurious and spacious for 2 adults/couples. The bed is extremely comfortable and the toilet comes with automated bidet, seat warmer and a long bath! The room was spotlessly clean with in-room coffee tea and tea-infused toiletries.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Amazing room and Hospitality
desc: Stayed at the Clan Hotel for 3D2N for my partner's birthday and Anniversary 2 weeks ago and was amazed at the hospitality. The room was amazing, we got the Grand Premier King and we were staying on the 36th floor (if I'm not wrong) and the view was unobstructed. The layout of the room was great as well and it is definitely suited for a romantic time with your loved one. There were many different snacks and teas for us to try as well which was an added bonus! The hospitality was also amazing. We had the butler to draw our bubble bath on the second night and she was most polite and efficient. As we barely left the hotel and opted for food delivery, the receptionist was always polite and happy to give us a call when our food order has arrived downstairs. Also, we had a cake which

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great stay. Very clean and service was good.
desc: Fast reception. Able to answer queries confidently. Facilities and room are clean as well. Location is great as many places to eat close by. They allowed late check-out (subjected to availability). However, they did not extend the card to allow for late check-out but was resolved quickly when I went to the reception to reactivate it. Would recommend to friends and family to stay here.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Excellent on All Counts
desc: Located in the city area close to Chinatown, this addition to the Far East Hospitality chain of hotels is a gem. I love the textures and colours that outfitted the hotel, and the scent permeating the air as I stepped into the hotel was spellbinding. Dark colours were the order of the day, from the lobby and lifts to the rooms. As part of the arrival experience before heading up to their rooms, guests are treated to a tea ceremony in the beautiful lobby. The lobby decor is carefully curated with artifacts, and builds on the original building site and its surroundings‚Äô past associations with the Chinese clans of yesteryear. A nice touch is the interesting bits of trivia flashed on the elevator TV screens. My allocated room was at the end of the corridor, and was spacious. Though

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Perfect for the couple
desc: The room was clean and we had an enjoyable stay at clan hotel. The location situated perfectly directly in between the city area. It was very convenient for us to travel to anywhere in the city area without any hinderance.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Great experience
desc: Had a great experience at the Clan Hotel. The room was perfect with a really spacious bathroom, housekeeping was good too, they made sure everything was clean and tidied up. Requesting for additional items such as plates/utensils/toiletries were met with a quick response. Will definitely return.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The amazing clan
desc: First time step into the lobby, smell the fragrant of tea made me felt fresh, and had the tea and pia ceremony..trully amazed by the small gesture but appreciate deeply in my heart. The hotel is new, clean and neat. So different with the others hotels that i had been. Recommended. Will come again. Keep the traditional the clan.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice and clean hotel
desc: Good experience and friendly staff.I like this hotel cause very clean and comfortable. The staff also friendly and will ask if i need use gym room or if need go pool.will stay again at least once per month.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Not suitable for a business traveller
desc: I stayed at the Clan Hotel for a week in Late March 2022 on business. I typically stay at the Andaz or the Westin. These hotels didn‚Äôt have our corporate rate, but the Clan did. I checked TripAdvisor and was surprised to see it was highly rated (#2 at the time) - given it‚Äôs new and it‚Äôs a boutique hotel I didn‚Äôt ascribe too much merit to the review but figured it couldn‚Äôt be bad. The hotel is perfectly nice, being new the rooms are well appointed but they are extremely small. Smaller than Paris small. So small that the sink are is outside the ensuite. There is very little area to store luggage and there is no closet (again the clothes are hanged outside of an enclosure and next to the sink). It gives off a cute vibe but if you are not alone (my Partner is staying with

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Meticulous Service
desc: Perfect stay w The Clan, the fourth time back and Joanne was attentive and welcoming during our stay. Hope to be back soon and hoping that The Clan could extend the 3d2n anniversary package so that my partner and I can come by during our anniversary!!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Friendly staff, great location, very clean
desc: Almost embarrassing at times the lengths staff were prepared to go for you. All very diligent and friendly. Hotel very modern and clean. Only complaint is I had to work extra in the gym as the breakfast options all very rich. Something a little simpler and lower calorie might be a good option. Although I definitely enjoyed it all at the time!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Grand Premier Room Experience
desc: We stayed at The Clan Hotel for just over a week and had a wonderful stay here in a Grand Premier room. The hotel is fairly new so everything looks great. They accommodated my request for a high floor room too. The room had a great view across the city. The employees were friendly and room service was prompt.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: A great first holiday post-covid
desc: Centrally located, this was an ideal place to call home while away. The room was beautifully designed given the space, with the right touches but not overdone. The pool and spa on the top floor were a great way to unwind at the end of the day, and staff were all kind and courteous. Can‚Äôt wait to return.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Coolest hotel in Singapore
desc: With the modern dark finishes, this hotel suits anyone with attention to design & detail. The staff greeted you well upon arrival. The pool on the roof top was amazing. A short walk to Marina Bay & food market. Highly recommended.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: The Clan Hotel
desc: Staffs are polite and friendly. Was all cleared said and was well offered. View was good at high level of cause. Quiet and very comfort. Pool at high level with very nice view! Just that it might get bored fast :)

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Lovely, new and clean hotel!
desc: Very nice Hotel situated conveniently near MRT and main attractions. It was very clean, staff was great, loved the welcoming tea ceremony. The facilities of the gym and pool were amazing as well. I would definitely recommend anyone to come stay here during their visit to Singapore.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Nice hotel but disappointing customer service following stay
desc: I really wanted to like The Clan. The decor and fit out were lovely, the location was great, and the service, while we were at the hotel, was ok. However, a few days after our stay, some charges from The Clan appeared on our credit card (without any bill or invoice being provided). I assumed the charges were for drinks we had at the hotel bar, and which I had tried to pay for at check out, but I was told it had "all been taken care of" and no invoice was provided at check out or subsequently. The charges on our credit card were significantly more than the cost of the drinks. hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Good centrally located business hotels
desc: A conveniently located business hotel with a cool atmosphere. The rooms are on the small side as expected for a central location but the shower and views are great! The shower suites were really great to freshen up after checkout before heading to the airport!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: CW Business Stay 12 nights
desc: Great hotel, friendly and attentive staff. Great atmosphere, clean, modern rooms of a high standard. Less variety on food and beverage menu that you would expect of a hotel of this standard, and also restrictive timings on room service.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: amazing experience for the price
desc: I booked this hotel for a four-night stay and it was by far the most wonderful hotel i‚Äôve ever stayed in. perfectly clean, beautiful rooms, and amazing view from the pool. The value was incredible considering the quality.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Could not fault anything!
desc: We stayed for 4 days and 3 nights and could not fault one single thing. The hotel is brand new, immaculate and in such a great location, we could walk mostly everywhere or get a really cheap Grab. Check in and check out were a breeze, airport transfers with the hotel were super easy and staff were always lovely. The room was a great size, had every comfort we needed and was surprisingly quiet given proximity to other rooms, sound proofing works. The pool and heated spa are a great addition on the top floor also. My go to hotel in Singapore, I will be staying again.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Thank you.
desc: I am very much satisfied with the room and the service provided. Liked your eco-initiative to use the purified tap water. It would be nicer if I could have a bothrobe and ice dispenser at some floors.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Without fault. Simply superb. Thank you.
desc: Has to be up there with my best ever hotel stays ever. The service is without fault, understated, efficient and world class. I love the whole cool design of the hotel and the overall decor. The views from the upper floor hotel rooms are brilliant over the entire city. At night this view is awe inspiring. The food offer is superb. There really is nothing bad to say about The Clan. Highly, highly recommended. I will return!

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Unique concept, attentive staff & comfortable room!
desc: We liked that the story of the hotel was introduced to us. Very attractive design and concept. Decent size facilities, the pool has fantastic view, and the gym is complete too. We had an overall memorable experience at the Clan.

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: 6 Star Service for a 5 Star Hotel
desc: Words cannot describe how perfect the hotel is, right from the minute we entered all the way to the convenience of checking-out. We were welcomed with a gong. At reception, Sam greeted us and offered us a late checkout knowing that it was our anniversary staycation. There was also a tea ceremony where we were served delicious tea and mooncake. The hotel was booked out the weekend when I checked again but there was no crowd at all (except the pool). Room felt just nice. Layout wasn't too cramped. We had free minibar drinks too! The in-room tea from Pryce fitted the style and feel of the hotel very well. The view from the room was also very scenic! The only thing I had to point out was the toilet bowl detects any slight movement and will start spraying water/sanitising/cleaning

hotelname: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Very nice and central - good offer/price
desc: The hotel is very nice with big enough rooms and great gym/swimmingpool. The resturant is also very good. Only thing it might be improved is the breakfast - a free choice of easy things (e.g. bread and butter) would be good.
